item.title: Stvarce
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Kdo bi si mislil, da je minilo ze pet dni od kar je bil ta koscek tega majhnega koscka vesolja posodobljen. Zanimivo je kaj se zgodi s casom pod poeinsteinovskimi pogoji ukrivljanja casa in distorcije percepcije, ki jo s skupnim imenom imenujemo kar ukrivi-moj-razpolozljivi-caso-okoli-lenobe, niti sam Einstein ni mogel tega razloziti.

V glavnem, danes se bo v tem psotu pojavilo nekaj zanimiv linkov. Za zacetek recimo tale stvarca, ki odgovori na najbolj perece vprasanje clovesta. Kaksna tocno JE zracna hitrost neobremenjene lastovke. Ze v casih Svetega Grala so se s tem ukvarjali... kdor se ni videl tega Monty Python filma naj se gre skrit pred oblicjem sveta dokler si ne ogleda takih zivljensko pomembnih stvari, saj nima v civiliziranem svetu sploh kaj poceti.

Potem imamo tu se naprimer tole stvar, zelo zanimivo za nekaj tako preprostega kot je izogibanje nekaj norim skatlam z... skatlo.

Danes sem odkril tudi nekaj kar veliko ljudi oznacuje kot edino zivljenjsko pomembno stvar in jo imenuje Slashdot. Vse skupaj je predvsem zelo ogromno in me kar srat prime, ko vidim kaj vse lahko nastavim in kolik onastavitev niti ne vem kaj v bistvu naj bi pocele. Bo potrebno malo bolj pregledati vse skupaj, ampak je videti kot dober vir novic.

item.title: Thingies
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Wow, it's been five days already since an update to this section of this part of the known universe. Quite interesting what time does under posteinsteinian relativistic experiences where the mind comes to the part of time called the warp-around-my-schedule-with-lazy. It's an interesting phenomena, even Einstein could not explain it.

Anyway, that aside, there are some magnificent links to be supplied within this post today; firstly the answer to the all time most important question of humanity. Just what IS the air speed velocity of an unladen swallow. You can beat that's a Monty Python and the Holy Grail reference. If you haven't seen that movie you are missing out on a whole lot and should hide from humanity's view until you do.

There is also this little fun thing that is amazingly fun for such a simple concept as dodging a bunch of blocks with a... block.

Today I've discovered this thing that many seem to see as a life's must and like to name Slashdot. So far it's been a bit overwhelming, even the whole configuration part where you can customise a whole lot is... blam huge. So I'll have to look into that some more but it seems to be a nice source of news on the geeky side of the world.

item.title: Imperiji
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ta teden sem odkril dve cudoviti stvari. Ena je browser based gaming, se pravi igra, ki se igra preko brskalnika, drugo pa cudovit strip.

Nikoli si nisem mislil, da je igranje preko brskalnika res tako zanimivo, res da so drugi o tem govorili, vendar le kako bi lahko verjel predenj poskusim. Izkazalo se je, da je Imperia Online najboljsa mozna oblika MMORPG-ja. Ima vse dobre lastnosti, kot naprimer veliko igralcev in zanimivo igralnost, nima pa problemov, kot naprimer obveznost prezdeti neskoncne ure za racunalnikom, ko samo igras. Je odlicna igra za tiste, ki nimajo prav dosti casa in radi zraven pocnejo se kaj drugega. Edina slabost bi lahko bila, da ni nekega aktivnega igralnega nacina.

Druga stvar, strip, je pa odlicni Death & Maiden, ki govori o Smrti in ji da zanimivo osebnost, ki je zacuda kompleksna in cisto proti neki obicajni predstavi, vendar pa hkrati doseze, da ni nekaksna klisejsko neumna parodija. Strip je zakljucil prvi del, kar je zalostno, ker je bil odlicen, drugi del pa, kljub temu, da je zelo spremenil nacin pripovedovanja in ton stripa, kaze velik potencial. Bomo videli...

item.title: Empires
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Haven't posted in quite a while, been busy and when you add a pinch of lazy to the mix you get some pretty powerful magic.

In the past week I've discovered two very interesting and awesome things. One is browser based gaming, sure I've been told about it, but wow it's awesome once youa ctually try. This has got to be the best MMORPG I've ever played. It's got all the properties of a MMORPG, except perhaps for an active environment, but in the mean time it's lacking all of the bad properties. It doesn't eat up all of your time and it certainly doesn't glue you to the computer screen for hours on end. On top of that Imperia Online has very nice hand drawn images that are simply marvelous to look at.

Another great discovery was Death & Maiden a very funny webcomic that speaks of Death being quite the interesting and complex character that is getting cheated by a mere girly. The first part was great, sadly it's finished already, and the second part is showing great promise, although it's made in a somewhat different naration style. So guess we'll see...

item.title: IPSC 2006
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Nekateri ga mogoce poznate, nekateri morebiti ne, IPSC je cudovito tekmovanje skupinskega programiranja oz. resevanja problemov. Za leto 2006 se je odvil danes in sodelovanje je bila precudovita poezija uma, logike in pice. Sodeloval sem ze tretjic, vendar sem prvic cutil, da lahko celo resno pripomorem k resevanju nalog in nisem le nekaksen stroj za proizvodnjo nenavadnih "out of the box" idej za resitve. Ekipa se je uvrstila na 20. mesto visokosolske divizije in na priblizno 110. mesto odprte divizije, kar sicer ne zveni kot veliko, vendar pa pomen, da smo najboljsa ekipa v radiju priblizno 1000km.

Pred dnevi sem se tudi zacel ukvarjati s preucevanjem cloveskih poz, predvsem risanja le-teh. Sklenil sem narisati 1000 takih hitrih skic, katerih namen ni nekaj estetsko lepega, ampak pridobivanje obcutka za hitro ujemanje gibanja v nekaj, kar ni videti narejeno, umetno. Ta sposobnost potem v koncni fazi pripomore k bolj verjetnih pozah likov na resnejsih delih.

item.title: IPSC 2006
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Some of you perhaps know of this wonderful thing called The IPSC. Today makred my third attendance at this party of an event and it was the best one yet. For the first time I actually felt competent to solve something rather than jsut be there as an idea chest with silly ideas that might work... a brainstorming machine if you will. Anyway, we ranked 20th in the high school division and around 110th in the open division. It might not sound much, but it makes us the highest ranking team in the radious of something like 1000 kilometeres...

In other news, I've started studying human gestures and have decided to create 1000 of these scrible-like drawrings. They are quite fun to make but provide practice for what is in my oppinion one of the most important aspects of drawing humans and human-like things. Fluency in motion and stature. Practice like this helps to make the body language of your work seem more real and so on. It's not about making pretty pictures though... at least the practice part isn't.

item.title: Stripi in knjige
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Pred nekaj dnevi, natanÄneje 10. maja, je izšla prva knjiÅ¾na izdaja spletnega stripa Inverloch, ki ga v njegovi spletni obliki spremljam Å¾e kar nekaj Äasa. TeÅ¾ko priÄakovana knjiÅ¾na verzija prve knjige bi mroala prispeti v knjigarno, preko katere sem knjigo naroÄil, v dveh tednih od izdaje... le upamo lahko da bo temu res tako.

V tem tednu sem odkril dva nova spletna stripa, ki sta odliÄna za branje in sem za branje celotnega arhiva porabil kar nekaj Äasa. Oba sta bila hitro dodana med dolg spisek spletnih stripov, ki jih redno spremljam. Se pravi wullfmorgenthaler in Pewfell sta dva odliÄna stripa, ki ju mora vsakdo prebrati.

Z veseljem tudi sporoÄam, da sem v soboto konÄno dobil dve knjigi H. P. Lovecrafta, ki sem ju naroÄil. Brez materiala za branje je bila v tednu kar suša tole pa bi moralo teÅ¾ave odliÄno pozdraviti. Knjigi sta v bistvu zbirki njegovih novel, kar naj bi bil najbolj primeren naÄin za zaÄetek raziskovanja tako ekstenzivnega opusa.

item.title: Comics and books
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A few days ago, on the 10th of May to be precise, a book edition of the webcomic Inverloch has been released. I've been a great fan of the webcomic version for quite some time now and I can hardly wait for the bookstore through which I've ordered the book to receive it, supposedly this will be two weeks after release... we shall see.

Also during this week and weekend I have discovered two wonderful webcomics that have urgently been added to the quite extensive list of webcomics I read regularly. They are wullforgenthaler and Pewfell, both provided hours upon hours of entertainment as I struggled to read through the archives.

One of the greatest thing that happened on Saturday was that the two books from H. P. Lovecraft that I've ordered have arived and I picked them up. It has been quite a drought without any fresh reading material but this should prove to provide quite some reading time until they are finished with. Two lovely collections of short stories with some of Cthulhu, these are the ones I'm most interested in at the moment.

item.title: Del 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Malo kasneje od priÄakovanega, vendar prvi del je konÄno tu. Je veliko stvari za povedat ampak ne ravno v tem trenutku.

item.title: Issue 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This took longer than expected, but the first issue of Cthulhu is finally here. Don't feel like blabbering much right now, but there are things that need saying.

item.title: Barvanje
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Z veseljem oznanjam, da je risanje stripa konÄano in je na vrsti le še barvanje vsega skupaj, kar zna trajati nekaj Äasa. Predvideno je, da naj bi strip bil pripravljen nekako do sredine tedna. Slika, ki jo vidite zgoraj, je neke vrste predogled stripa in predstavlja zadnjo sliÄico brez teksta in verjetno v ne ravno dokonÄni obliki.

item.title: Colouring
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Glad to announce that the penciling for the whole comic has been finished and the colouring was commenced. This will take some time but presumably the comic should be up by the middle of the week or something like that. The image you can see above is a sneek peak from the comic, it is to be the last panel, though currently without speech bubbles and probably not completely the last version.

item.title: V
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Remember, Remember
The fifth of November,
The gunpowder treason and plot.
I know of no reason
Why the gunpowder treason
Should ever be forgot.


Danes sem si ogledal sem si film V for Vendetta, narejen po stripu istega imena, in moram reči, da je odličen. Dobra zgodba (čeprav nekako spominja na 1984 pomešan z Fantom iz opere). Igranje je bilo tudi zelo dobro ter prav tako režija. Da ne govorim o posebnih učinkih; najboljši del filma je, ko ura na Big Benu odleti proti gledalcu, skoraj nedotaknjena, medtem, ko se cel stolp dobesedno zdrobi na koščke. Čudovito.
Natalie Portman je bila odlična kot Evey Hammond, ampak saj je bila odlična tudi v Piratih s Karibov, odlična igralka.

item.title: V
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Remember, Remember
The fifth of November,
The gunpowder treason and plot.
I know of no reason
Why the gunpowder treason
Should ever be forgot.


Watched V for Vendetta, made after a comic book of the same title, today and I have to say, the movie was absolutely marvelous. The plot was great (although it kind of reminded me of Nineteen-eighty-four meets Phantom of the opera). Also the acting and the directing and even the special effects were really awesomely done. The absolutely best moment was when Big Ben's clock face blew out in such a lovely fashion. It stayed completely whole whilst the whole tower just shatter and flew out towards the viewer. Awesome.
Natalie Portman also did a great job as Evey Hammond, but then again she was great also in Pirates of the Caribbean. She makes a good actor really.

item.title: Of penguins and OSes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A few days ago, on Thursday to be precice, a great journey has begun, a journey into the lands of penguins and operating systems. After a short and bitter format of the main hard-drive came a long and bloody battle for the installation of a fresh Gentoo linux. The battle had lasted for roughly three days and still there are some things to be done. The scanner, for instance, is still being a bourden that doesn't quite function.

Work has also started on the first issue of Cthulhu and what's come out of the blank paper so far isn't at all too shabby. I managed to pencil the first panel, which was an endeavour that took roughly an hour. Come to think of it, the first issue has 14 of these panels and it makes me cry. When you add another two hours for colour of a single panel you can see that the making of the first issue is to take roughly 42 hours, which must be the reason why this comic is refreshed only monthly. From another perspective, an average work week contains 42 hours, so if this comic was to be updated weekly...

A new static page has also been made, the very first actually its reason are purely and only links.

item.title: O pingvinih in OS-ih
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Pred nekaj dnevi, natancneje v cetrtek, se je zacelo dolgo popotovanje, potovanje po cudnih dezelah pingvinoh in operacijskih sistemov. Po kratkem in bolecem praznenju osnovnega diska je prisla dolga bitka za oblast in obstoj z instalacijo svezega Gentoo-ja. Bitka je rajala priblizno tri dni, in v bistvu nekatere stvari se vedno niso kot bi morale biti. Na primer skener se vedno protestira in je neuporaben.

Zacel sem tudi z delom na prvem delu Cthulhu-ja in sem kar zadovoljen z izgledom, ki se pojavlja na praznem papirju. Uspel sem zrisati prvo okence, kar je trajalo priblizno eno uro... Ce pomislim, da je v prvem delu 14 takih okenc me kar stisne pri srcu. V bistvu, ce na to priracunamo se, da barvanje enega takega okenca traja priblizno dve uri, se vidi, da bo izdelava prvega dela trajala 42 ur, kar je verjetno razlog zakaj je nov del samo enkrat na mesec. Iz drugega stalisca, povprecen tedenski delavnik je 42 ur, tako da ce bi hotel, da je strip tedenski...

Narejena je bila tudi nova staticna stran, prva v bistvu, njena namembnost so cisto samo povezave.

item.title: Ko je prost dan zaposlen
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Danes je bil prvi dan v seriji 6ih uradno prostih dni, zaporedja praznikov, ki nikogar pravzaprav ne zanimajo. Vse se vrti le okoli tega, da ni pouka, sluzb in podobnega, vendar pa je vsega skupaj pravzaprav le en ubogi dan pocitnic, vse ostalo so prazniki, ko teh stvari tako-ali-tako ni.

Vendar pa danasnji dan vseeno ni bil prost in brez obligacij, saj sem pogumno sel na pomoc bivsemu sosolcu pri izdelavi seminarske naloge za maturo, da bi clovek dobil dobro oceno in podobne reci. Po deseturnem garanju se je uspelo spisati nekaj spodobnega in dolgega kar 17 strani, vendar pa to naj sploh ne bi bilo veliko. Stvar je prav strasna in me ustrahuje, da se bojim naslednjega leta, ko isto doleti tudi mene in se bo potrebno podajati v te vode za samega sebe... to je bil le nekaksen pripravljalni boj.

Tudi danes, v bistvu bol danasnji vecer, sem gledal film Kralj Artur (King Arthur), ki je zelo odlicen film. Super rezija in izjemna zgodba z ravno pravim kanckom dobre stare zgodbe or Kralju Arturju in vitezih Okrogle mize. Tu je zgodba seveda sla malo drugac, naj bi bilo po bolj resnicnih zgodovinskih zapisih, a kdo bi vedel, vazno, da je zgodba super.


V drugih novicah, pred nekaj dnevi mi je uspelo zrisati prvo zamenjavo stripa, ki bo zapolnjevala prostor dokler se ne naredi prvi strip, ki bo po nacrtih izdan nekje v prvem tednu maja. Pasic mi nekako ni uspelo narediti, ker se je izkazalo, da je izdelava pasice s katero bi bil clovek zadovoljen veliko tezja, kot pa se kaze na prvi pogled. Upam torej, da se bo dalo kaj narediti do konca praznikov.

item.title: When a free day is busy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Today was the first day of 6 days where there is no official obligation of any kind. Some national holidays nobody cares of mixed together with a single day that is absolutely free but would not have to be creates the so called "First of May holiday". It's a nice tradition and it comes in handy for catching up with ral life instead of having to deal with school all the time.

Today though, the day was not completely free of stuff as I valiantly went to help an ex school mate with his graduation paper so that he may graduate from highschool with a grade that is decent or even better than that. We laboured for nigh on 10 hours and came up with seventeen pages of writen documentation for a snake game. It was an interesting experience, yet very frightening as the same awaits me next year, very frightening indeed.

Also today, more like this evening, I watched the movie King Arthur which was very good and had quite an interesting twist to the ancient tale. It was great, everyone who is into lore and mythology should see it, and even those who are not into such things. Sadly, weak and weary and very dreary I nodded but a little but it was alas enough to miss parts of the movie and it shall have to be seen again... soon.



In other news, I have gotten the placeholder for the comic up a few days ago but the banners eluded me by being very hard and difficult to design. This should be getting done before the end of this series of free days and work on the first comic will also start sometime about now. It should be up ere the end of the first week of May.

item.title: Se dogaja
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Na stran je bilo dodanih nekaj stranskih stolpcev (se vedno ne vem kako tocno naj bi se to prevajalo) z oglasi, tagboardom itd. Najvecji dosezek je bil, da je skorajda uspelo napraviti, da se stran pokaze v vseh pomembnejsih browserjih enako. Trenutno se popolnoma pravilno prikaze v FireFoxu in Operi v Interenet Explorerju pa je vse skupaj zelo blizu pravilnosti. Ko pa pride do Konquerorja se stvari zapeletejo... zelo zapeletejo.

Pri kompatibilnosti med browserji mi je najbolj zanimivo dejstvo, da ce imas sliko sirine 400px in pod njo div prav tako sirine 400px, ta dva nista enako siroka, razlike je kar 2px, v nobenem brskalniku razen v Operi. Zelo cudno moram reci, se pa da na dokaj preprost nacin zaobiti.

V nacrtu je bil se nadomestni strip namesto prvega dela in pa nekaj benerjov, vendar bo kot kaze to nekako moralo pocakati na "jutri"

item.title: Going strong
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Quite some things have happened to the website as sidebars have been added, with the google ads and the tagboard and so on. The nastiest of the endeavours was trying to get the page to display properly in different browsers and I managed to make it work in both FF and Opera, but it still doesn't work quite well in IE and is downright nasty (although still useful) in konqueror.

Cross-browser support is really strange, if you have a 400px wide image above a 400px wide div, somehow those two are of different widths by 2px in just about every browser save for Opera. This strikes me as severely odd, but it has a simple workaround... still seems rather silly.

Wanted to make a placeholder instead of the first comic but didn't quite get around to colouring it just yet, so it, and some banners, should most probably be put on the site sometime tomorow

item.title: ©kodljivo?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Prvo, kot prvo, verjetno ste opazili, da stripa nekako še ni na svojem dodeljenem mestu, ki je gor, èeprav je bilo obljubljeno, da bo dotièni srip do trenutnega trenutka ¾e davno na voljo. Do razlik med fikcijo in realnostjo je prišlo po nekaj preprostih korakih. Prvi korak je bil ta, da ima dotièni èlovek, ki stripe ustvarja praktièno dvojno zaposlen, se pravi ena polna zaposlitev in ena honorarna (èeprav sta v bistvu obe honorarni). Drugi korak je bil, da se je raèunalnik, na katerem se odvija vse delo, odloèil biti nesramna baraba in imeti napako na disku natanko tam, kjer so bili do nedavnega vsi deli stripa oz. skoraj vsi ti deli. Sedaj je potrebno vse še enkrat ustvariti in trenutno sem v procesu ustvarjanja kakor hitro zmorem.

S tem smo torej opravili, zdaj pa k zanimiv reèem. Èlan CAD forumov je odkril zanimivo stran, ki natanèno opisuje izdelavo, delovanje in uporabo naprave, ki spreminja tek èasa. Seveda te spremembe niso prave, ampak nekako navidezne, efekti so kljub temu odlièni. Tam je tudi prelep video prikaz vsega skupaj in... ogled je neizbe¾en, èe uidete temu ste... nenavadni, milo reèeno.

item.title: Harmless?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Firstly, as you may have noticed the comic is still not up even after I promised for it to be in its rightful position of being up. This is due to many reasons, one is that I now effectively have two jobs, one full time and one part time... moneys are important. Another reason is that the computer all of the work is done on decided to be a downright bastard and have a disk fault right where all the panels were, or at least most of them, so I ended up having to redo a big part of the comic... which I am now in the process of redoing as fast as possible.

Now that that's out of the way, today a great and quiet awesome video has been found by a member of the CAD forums and that video... shows how one can manipulate time. Of course it's not really time manipualtion but it does have the same effect. How to make the device, how to use it and what it actually does is greatly explained on the website. You really should go and have a look, it's worth it.

item.title: Èopièi
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Vèeraj sem odkril nekaj odliènega, nekaj tako superbno superiornega, da se še Da Vinci skrije v osramoèen. Kot ka¾e je va Photoshopu neka stvarca, ki do sedaj v mojih oèeh ni obstajala, omogoèa namreè nastavitve obnašanja èopièev. Odlièno, kar tako, pojavi se in puf, tam je.

Najva¾nejše pri tem je to kakšne vse nove mo¾nosti odpira, omogoèa res veliko. Ta strip je poskoèil v kvaliteti bolj kot poskoèi zalo velik zajec kadar zelo visoko skoèi. Efekti, za katere sedaj potrebujem le nekaj potegov z miško, drugaèe zahtevajo ure in ure dela, ki na koncu pripelje do prisiljenih in fuj efektov, tako pa so hitro in uèinkovito videti popolnoma naravno in fino.

Zakaj torej nisem prej zvedel za to èudovito reè? O.o

item.title: Brushes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Yesterday I've made a wonderful discovery in photoshop. There is a panel I was totally and completely unaware of, it allows you to change the behaviour of your brush. Sure this might seem as obvious to many of you as just why the rabbit is so deep inside the hole, but to me it was unexistand.

This discovery has enabled me two things, this webcomic has jumped in quality a lot yet it still retains what I like to consider a warm and fuzzy feel that was made with the pencils being left in over the computer colouring. Now the pencils are done away with yet the thing still remains nice and fluffy almost makes you want to cuddle it.

Another great thing is that I am now able to get effects done quickly and effortlessly that would otherwise require hours upon hours of work and still wouldn't look very well. They would look forced and ew, now they look natural and yum.

item.title: Kristusove gate
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Koledar pravi, da je konec mesca tu in Äeprav koledarju ne gre verjeti kar vsega, kar tako tja v en dan govori, bi se lahko reklo, da je pri stvareh za katere je bil namenjen kar zanesljiv. VeÄji problem kot konec meseca bi lahko bil, da strip še ni konÄan. Ideja stripa je, da naj bi bil Äimbolj kvaliteten, kvantiteta pa potem seveda trpi. Zgodilo se je paÄ, da je mesec bil kar poln raznoraznih neumnosti in tako je potem kvantiteta zelo trpela.
Strip bo konÄan do konca tedna potem pa se bo imenoval Avgustovski strip. To seveda zdaj zgleda kot pokvarjen trik, udarec pod pasom, vendar ni. To se bo tako zgodilo zaradi tega, da dobim potreben luft v mesecu; omogoÄilo bo, da se dela na stripih za naslednji mesec. Se pravi, še vedno se muÄim cel mesec kot sedaj, vendar potem nov strip pride na zaÄetku meseca namesto na koncu. Super kaj?

Nekateri ste morda tudi opazili da spletna kamera na levi na opravlja svojih dolÅ¾nosti kot bi jih morala. No bila je temeljito izprašana in bo morala odgovarjati za svoja dejanja oz. v tem primeru nedejanja. Po dolgem muÄenju se je mehanizem zlomil in priznal, da ima del, ki nalaga slike na server probleme z nekimi socketi in paÄ ne gre nalagati. V to bom seveda ob priliki pogledal in skušal popraviti... do takrat pa se vidi kar se vidi.

item.title: Holy Crap
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The end of the month is apparently here, this means that the month is over and the same oges for the time left to create this month's comic. Sadly there is also the fact hat the comic hasn't been finished yet, mostly because the idea is to produce quality work and there simply hasn't been much time to devote to it so it didn't get finished. I will do my best to get the issue finished by hte end of the week and then it shall be called the August update.
This might seem as a dirty trick I know, but it will enable me to work on the comics for next month rather than rushing to complete comics for this month. That means, I labour all month just as now, but then the update happens in the beginning of the month, pretty good huh.

Also you mahe have noticed that the webcam on the left hasn't been performing it's duties, this is because the uploader keeps complaining about some socket error, I have no idea what it's nagging on about but it just cannot upload the camera image. Will have to look into fixing that in the immediate future.

item.title: ©topanje
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Pred nekaj dnevi, v èetrtek èe se izra¾anje stori natanèno, sem stopil v èudovito knjigarnico v katero ponavadi stopam, da dobim svoj redno potrebni fiks. Tam me je èakala, svetleèa, nova, lepa knjiga, ki sem jo bil naroèil, Štoparski Vodnik po Galaksiji. Knjiga je zelo lepo bralna, zelo dobro napisana in te marsikdaj pripravi do smeha. Govori se celo, da je tudi slovenski prevod prav odlièen in  niè kaj prevodovsko slab. Dotièna izdaja, ki jo uporabljam, naj bi vsebovala kar pet romanov inu eno zgodbo... kar je precej veliko, pravzaprav kar 800 strani.

Po drugi strani pa pod mojo posteljo mirno èaka gospod Cthulhu v mirnem prièakovanju nove epizode svojega stripa. Obljubim, da na le-tem delam s polno paro... no skoraj polno... in strip prav lepo napreduje in bi se lahko reklo, da je v boljšiligi kot prvi dve epizodi.

item.title: Hitchhiking
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A few days ago, on Thursday to be precise, I stepped into the magnificent bookstore thing I usually go to in order to get my fix and there it was, waiting for me, the book I had ordered, The Ultimat Hitchhiker's Guide. It's an amazingly well written book with lots of funny little twists and turns and it even makes one laugh a lot. This edition supposedly has 5 novels and a story inside... so that's quite some reading material. 800 pages worth in fact.

On the other hand there is mister Cthulhu, he has been calmly waiting under my bed to get another issue published and I assure you I am working full steam on it... well almost, I do take way too many breaks, anyway the issue is progressing and is turning out quite lovely. So just remain patient eh.

item.title: Spanje
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Spanje... je bedno. Res je, da ga telo potrebuje in oÄitno tudi mentalna vsebina moÅ¾gan, vsaj glede na znanost, ki naj bi v tem Äasu bila tista ta-pametna.

Ampak lahko ste gotovi, da takoj, ko doÅ¾ivite veÄ spanca kot kolikor ste navajeni pride do marsikaterega problema. Tako na primer je dan kar naenkrat Äarobno krajši in ne morete opraviti vsega, kar je potrebno, tak spanec vas tudi pusti povsem zaspane, zmatrane in drugaÄe narobe.

Vse to dobi piko na i, ko v trenutku usedanja na kolo za odhod v sluÅ¾bo priÄne deÅ¾evati potem pa morate neznansko dolgo Äakati na avtobus, vse skupaj zaÄinjeno z vrnitvijo do kolesa, ki je bilo oÄitno ukradeno... jupi.

V glavnem... spanje je bedno.

item.title: Sleep
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Sleep simply sucks. Yes the body needs it and apparently so does the mind, that's what official mainstream science says anyway.

But you can rest assured that as soon as you get more than what you are accustomed to there are problems. Not only is the day magically shortened and you are unable to complete all of your duties it also leaves you sleepy, cranky and otherwise in a bad mood.

This is even better topped off if on the same day a lot of things seem to go wrong, like raining the moment you want to bike to work and then ahving to wait a whole whole lot of time waiting for the bus plus when coming back to the bike... it's stolen.

All in all... sleep is bad for you.

item.title: Skice dneva
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Se spomnite, dnevne skice... tiste, ki bi naj bile posodobljene vsak dan tamkaj pod sliko s kamere? No spremenile so se v sem-pa-tja skice, precej patetiÄno.

Razlog ni, da bi bila oseba, ki jih riše lena ali še huje lenobno nastrojena, razlog je bolj v tem, da dan nekako nima dovolj ur, še veÄ, nima dovolj ur v katerih bi se dotiÄna oseba poÄutila dovolj kreativno. Odkar je potrebno vstajati ob šestih zjutraj, kolesariti na lekcije voÅ¾nje, voziti v neumnih in popolnoma nepomembnih smereh, kolesariti v sluÅ¾bo, biti produktiven deset ur, kolesariti domov in se nabasati s hranilnimi vrednostmi; nekako ne ostane veÄ veliko produktivnosti. NoÄi se po nenavadnih nakljuÄjih porabijo za spanje ali internet. Precej patetiÄno v bistvu.

Le upamo lahko, da je bil ta teden nekakšna aklimacijska doba in se bo sedaj vse vrnilo nazaj v uteÄ‡ene tirnice. Vsaj dnevne skice upam, da bodo posodobljene vsak dan, bom paÄ popil še veÄ kofeiniranih stvari, da bo to realizirano.

item.title: Sketches of day
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Daily sketches huh. THe ones that are supposed to be refreshed every day under the webcam image... Yes they have kind of turned into now and anon sketches, terribly sorry about that. It's not that the eprson doing them is utterly lazy, it has more to do with there only being so many hours in the day and what's more, there being only so many hours in the day when said person can be productive.

It used to be simple, go to school, rest for those five or six hours, come home and be productive. But oh no, it can't be thus at the time of summer vacation, oh no indeed. Right now it's more like get up at six in the morning bycicle to the driving lesson, driv earound in useless directions, bycicle to work; be productive for ten straight hours, bycicle home, eat nutrition. Spend time online catching up on internet events, sure there's some of this at work, but you know, not that much.

Somehow that arrangement is leaving me too knackered to actually sketch, verily this was just because of the adjustment buffer and hopefully the organism has now adjusted to this rhythm of living and everything should be back to normal; at least as far as producing daily sketches go, which should thusly become daily.

item.title: ÄŒasovov
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Tole je bila zelo dolga novica, vendar pa ker je FireFox izredno neumen in je popacal session je stran izjavila, da nisem administrator in pojedla celoten tekst. ÄŒe se vam bere, ga imate v anglešÄini ... kdorkoli pa izdeluje FF naj se gre impalat (kdor ne ve kaj to pomeni naj si na wikipedii pogleda kaj je Vlad Tepes delal s svojimi jetniki)

item.title: Timenessness
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Wow, such a long time since there were any news reported here, not that there wasn't any news, just that I kept putting it off for fear of having a lot to say, you know how it is. So expect something a bit longer this time because there is much to tell and the hardest part always is trying to find a suitable place to start... so let's start from the beginning eh.

Roughly around the time of hte last news post I got a job which now takes 10 hour sout of my day with another two hour sfor commuting, I've never had to commute in my life, and it sucks, commuting is stupid. Takes too long and accomplishes almost nothing. The job, though, is simply magnificent, love every minute of it, really. This is some personalish news, now for more intersting things shall we.

A few days ago, or possibly even a week, who couild tell, I got a new book. A book that I have been waiting for for a long time. It is the book of Inverloch. It was a magnificent read, anyone who doesn't have it shoudl buy one r at least go check out the webcomic. The story is quite nice and the art pretty much superb; in fact it is one of the few manga comics I can stand.
There were a bit many downsides to the book though, so it doesn't get a perfect ten, a seven perhaps. The thing that stood out the most were some typos in the artist's blabber, I'm sorry, but when you publish a book you take care that there are no typos. Now I could understand there being a few typos in a hundred page novel, but at least two in just as many pages? That's just sloppy.
Which brings us to another point, I was expecting there to be a lot of artist's commentary, perhaps even on particular chapters or something. But all I got from the book were three pages (with illustrations) of a comment and two pages of extra comics, that are online just aswell. I was expecting a bit more from the first printed edition of Inverloch, but oh well, still quite lovely (a bit short too).
Everyone should get this book, and this is what it looks like:



Next item on the list, Opera 9. The next version of the magnificent browser that I adore is come a few days ago. Now it's great and all, but somehow it fails to impress. When I first opened it up I was all hyped up about new features and possibilites, of the new open windows of bright opportunity... and the final reaction was "What this is it?".
Don't get me wrong, all the fixes they did to the parsin are awesome, it even passes the dreaded Acid2 test now and supposedly has support for WYSIWYG editors (although I'm somehow not getting this functionality). But there is just something missing, there is no shiny.
The biggest thing they added are the widgets, and so far they have proven pretty much useles. There are none to be found that woudl have any usable value and the implementation is somehow lacking, something just doesn't quite snap right.
A great asset to thsoe who are into the developing business is the new and improved error reproter who nowadays reports everythign from javascript to CSS errors. Magnificent really ... but soemwhat hard to decypher and completely useless and baffling to average users. It probably only scares them without providing any valuable information.
Probably the best thing that was added is the tooltip preview that appears upon hovering over a tab, showing a small thumbnail of the page and some basic information, great for finding a certain website amongst many tabs.


Lastly, on the 22nd or something the lates Pure Pwnage episode has been released, episode 11. This show is absolutely wonderful and you are a blasphemer if you have not yet watched any of the episodes. I watched this last one roughly an hour after it became freely publically available, it was available before for paying folks, and I was a bit let down by this one. It might've bene that I was not in the mood but it did not seem as funny as some of the older ones and if you ask me it was a bit incoherent. There was no actual plot and there seemed to be very little actual script... or perhaps the execution of the script was just not that good. I blame the director/writer of the show... everyone knows that Kyle is just a noob.

item.title: Opa
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
VÄeraj, ko sem šel domov od paÄ nekje, sem ob cesti opazil dva modela, ki sta se pregovarjala prek manjšega avtotrka, bel Ford inu nek temen avto, Äe se prav spomnim, sem pomilsil nekaj v stilu, heh, nekje moje starosti. Ozrl sem se in se usral. Še pred letom dni bi si mislil, da sta velika starca, ker Å¾e imata avto in podobne stvari. A se res Å¾e tako staram ali kaj? To mora biti nekaj narobe...

Uglavnem, kljub temu, da sem kot kaÅ¾e prestrašen starÄek, to, kot kaÅ¾e, še ne pomeni, da sem kaj bolj moder inu ne len, saj sem dobrešenj del zadnjih dveh dni porabil s prebiranjem tegale arhiva. To seveda pomeni, da nisem risal stripa. Res je folk, niti ena sama Ärta stripa še ni narisana, kar neizbeÅ¾no pomeni, da ne bo izšel v kratkem, kot bi lahko bilo priÄakovati po prebiranju neke dotiÄne izjave, ampak da bo izšel nihÄe ne ve kdaj. Res je, da bo e vedno ob pravem Äasu, saj se bo v mesecu juniju, vendar kdaj v tem mesecu vam pa ne morem povedat.

item.title: Whoa
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Yesterday as I was going home from... somewhere... I saw two dudes arguing over a minor collision of their cars, a white Ford and a darkish something if I recall correctly, I thought to myself, heh they're my age group. Then it hit me. Even only a year ago I would have thought that they are old geezers compared to me. Is it reall happening? Am I really getting old? I don't want to be old, this is damn scary.

Anyway, now that I'm a scared old bastard, this apparently does not mean that I am any the wiser or anything like that, mainly so because I spent a good part of the last two days reading through these archives and not working on the comic at all. That's right folks, not even a single line of it has been drawn, which means that the update is not really due any minute as was expected but rather... postponed indefinitely. Sure, it will by "on time" as it will be in the month of June, but when in the month of June noone can predict, hopefully very soon.
