item.title: Skice
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Danes je za storiti nekaj oznanitev... je to sploh beseda... nobena od le-teh ni velicastna vendar tudi nobena ni nevelicastna, torej naj se oznanjanje kar pricne.

  1. Druga epizoda stripa Cthulhu je bila finalizirana kar se tice scenarija in bo najverjetneje koncana in nalozena do konca tedna, ce seveda ne bosta delo inu sola pojedla prevec tako zelo potrebnega casa, ki je potreben za izdelavo epizode. Nacrtovano je bilo, da bi danes pokazal skico osebka, ki bo nastopal v tej epizodi vendar do tega nekako ni prislo.
  2. Skupek direktorjev te strani... heh zanimiva misel... se je odlocil, da se bodo zacele delati vsakodnevne skice, ki se bodo po srecnem naklucju znasle na tej strani v taki ali drugacni obliki. Najverjetneje so bo ustvarjal thumbnail, ki bo dnevno osvezen pocival v kakem od stranskih stolpcev. Danes dobite prvo, potem pa se bodo dnevne osvezitve zacele, ko se pac bodo.
Za konec pa si se pojdite pogledat Blizzardovo skrivno omako.

item.title: Sketches
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Today there are some announcements to be made, nothing too grand, but nothing ungrand just the same. So let's to the beginning.

  1. Episode 2 of Cthulhu has had the script finalised and it should be finished and uploaded by the end of the week, if of course work and study won't suck up too large amounts of the much needed time to do so. Wanted to give you a sketch of a guest character, but you get nothing of the kind right now, sorry.
  2. A decision has been made by the board of directors for this site... heh that was a funny though... to start producing daily sketches and post them somewhere on the site, you get one sketch today and then sketches will soon begin daily with a thumbnail in one of the sidebars. Hopefully they will be entertaining and the one making them will have time to keep it up.
On a final note, go check out Blizzard's secret sauce.

item.title: Opa
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Dva dni nazaj, v petek zgodaj zjutraj, ko sem se prebudil iz spanca in prizgal racunalnik,d a bi se lotil pisanja, ker v celem dnevu na urniku ni bilo nobenega drugega opravila, je racunalnik zanikal sodelovanje in se ni prizgal. Ob vsakem poskusu je prisel natanko do trenutka, ko zacne pravilno uporabljati graficno kartico in zmrnil, odlocitev je padla, da je potrebna nova graficna kartica.

Ob hitrem skoku v trgovino sem opazil, da graficne kartice za AGP vodilo niso vec tako lahko dobljiva stvar, kot so bile vcasih. Scasoma, in po nekaj trgovinah, mi je koncno uspelo najti lepega Radeon x1600, ki je VELIKO boljsi kot starta GeForce 2 MX 400.

Torej sem prisel domov s prelepo crno skatlo pod pazduho in vstavil novo kartico v racunalo, ki pa se se vedno ni prav lepo prizgalo. Potrebno je obnoviti kernel. Po kar nekaj igrackanja je kernel koncno deloval pravilno in podpiral vse potrebne stvari (vedno kaj pozabim), ampak pojavili so se problemi z Xorg.

Izkazalo se je, da je potrebno na novo naloziti celoten Xorg, kar pa se je slucajno izkazalo za nekaj hujsega kot sem pricakoval, saj je zahtevalo migracijo na novi modularni X. Po dolgih urah poskusanja je stvar koncno bila v priblizno delujocem stanju, ko pa se je pojavila dokoncna zelja po dvojnem ekranarstvu. Nekako pa clovek opazi, da iz nenavadnih razlogov kaj takega zahteva ponovno instalacijo celotnega KDEja.

Zdaj sem torej tu, 6000 besed za casom in se vedno cakajoc instalacije nekaterih stvari. Casi, kot je ta, me pripravijo do razmisljanja zakaj je sploh trudim z Gentoojem in ne uporabljam raje kake distribucije kot naprimer Debian ali Ubuntu. Ah ja, danes je treba napisati 9000 besed, ce hocem ujeti samega sebe in priti nazaj v predviden cas, kar me sili v jok in cmizdrenje ...

item.title: Wow
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Two days ago, in the early morning of Friday, when I awoke and wanted to begin writing for the day, for there was naught else to be done, the computer refused to boot it. It came up to the point of laoding up 3d acceleration and properly utilise the graphics card and simply froze and would not budge. After trying this a few times a decision was made that a new graphics card is in order.

A quick dash to the tech store where apparently getting a new card that works with the AGP port is a difficult task but in the end I managed to get a quite cheap Radeon x1600 that is a LOT better than my old GeForce 2 MX 400.

So I come home with a lovely looking black box and put the new card in the computer, all fine and dandy, but it still doesn't boot up properly. A kernel update is needed. After some time fiddling with getting that to work properly and support everything that's needed (I always forget a bunch of stuff) there come Xorg problems.

And it came to the point that apparently I had to rebuild the whole Xorg and at the same time migrate to the new modular version of the thing. After long hours of getting that to work well enough to be usable came the idea of having dual screen. Now sure, it works perfectly fine at first glance, but you soon notice that rebuilding the entire KDE has to be done in order for it to work properly.

Now I am 6000 words behind schedule and still waiting for things to compile and install. It is times like these that make me ponder why exactly I'm using Gentoo and not some binary driven thing like Debian or Ubuntu. Oh well, I have 9000 words to write today if I desire to catch up and it makes me want to weep like a little baby.

item.title: Ironija
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Danes sem se uspel vkrcati na cudovito potovanje po oddaljenih dezelah in daljnoseznih obalah morij domisljije, ampak zakaj si cel dan napisal le ubogih 300 besed, se boste vprasali. Kot je seveda standard, nadlezno pravilo nihce-ne-ve-cesa, ni bilo casa napisati vseh teh cudovitih besed. Medtem, ko sem vceraj prezdel ure in ure za racunalnikom in samo cakal, da privre kaka beseda na dan, sem danes bil odsoten in samo cakal, da bom koncno lahko spisal vse kar komaj caka da se bo izlilo in prelilo. Z besedo, neumnost.

Se nekaj malega o trebuchetu, sedaj vsebuje 1.6 kilsko proti utez in se ob vsaki uporabi skoraj podre, domet pa je tako velik, da ga na zalost v tem stanovanju ne morem testirati; zalostno, preprosto zalostno.

item.title: Irony
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Today I managed to embark on a great voyage of distant lands and far reaching shores of the imaginative sea, but why have you only written only 300 words all day then, will you ask. Of course, it figures as a general rule of whatever, there was no time to actually write out all the wonderful inspiration begotten from the heights of above. Whereas yesterday I sat almost all day in front of the computer trying hard to think up words to write, today words were there, waiting, lusting to be written, but no time to actually write them out. In a word, stupidity.

Just a quick thought about the trebuchet, it now features a 1.6 kilo weight and almost falls apart each time it is used; the worst thing being that the size of my apartment doesn't permit testing of the maximum range it can achieve, sad, so sad.

item.title: Trebuchet
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
No, pa smo pri prvem dnevu dnevnih blogov in le upam lahko, da z le-temi ne bo problemov, ker ponavadi ni veliko zanimivega za povedat, ampak seveda se lahko vsako stvari naredi zanimivo z dobrim pisanjem, kar pa je v bistvu celoten namen tega podviga. Kaj ne? No, slika zgoraj je povezava na skupek fotografij lego trebucheta, ki sem ga sestavil v zadnjih nekaj dneh in danes zapravil veliko casa s streljanjem.

Kot lahko vidite, ni ravno najvecji trebuchet v obstoju, vendar je vseeno kar zajeten in je gotovo najvisja lego kreacija kar sem jih kdaj ustvaril. Protiutez je trenutno napolnjena s kovanci, kar omogoca domet priblizno 5 metrov in le upam lahko, da ribiski svinec ni predrag in bo lahko nadomestil trenutno polnilo.

 

Vceraj sem se slucajno spotaknil ob zelo prijeten mali strip, ki ga mocno priporocam v branje. Najverjetneje bi vas zanimalo tudi tole.

item.title: Trebuchet
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Well, here's the first of the daily blog days, hopefully these will not be a problem to write, because usually there isn't much to say, but hey, things can be made more interesting, that's what nano is about anyway is it not? Well, the image above is a link to a collage with crappy photos of the lego trebuchet I built in the last few days and spent quite some time tweaking it today.

As you can see, it's not the biggest trebuchet in existence, but it is quite tall and it happens to pack a punch unseen in my room before. The counter weight is right now filled with coins but I'll probably go buy some fishing lead tomorrow and fill it with that, reckon that will give me a weight of about 2 kilo. The range right now is about 5 meters for a block of four regular 2x4 lego bricks, which appears to be the optimum amunition.

 

I stumbled upon a very amusing little comic today, which I think you should go see because well, it's just awesome. You might also like to check out this.

item.title: NaNoWriMo
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
S skorajsnim koncem oktobra se nam NaNoWriMo nevzdrzno priblizuje. To bo kaoticen mesec hitrega misljenja, se hitrejsega tipkanja in neizmernih kolicin kofeina.

Cilj je, kot morda ze veste, napisati celoten roman v enem kratkem mesecu, ali pa vsaj prvih 50 tisoc besed le-tega, no, ni nujno, da ravno prvih; 50k besed v glavnem. Naloga se je lani izkazala za dosegljivo, saj sem v manj kot mesecu dosegel priblizno 55k besed. Roman ni bil potem nikoli dokoncan, se manj pa izdan. Letos bom skusal osebni cilj 90k besed doseci raje z serijo medsebojno povezanih novel, ki bodo verjetno izpadle kot nekaksna poglavja romana. Ko bo vsega konec pa bom storil se vse v svoji moci, da bi prislo do izdaje te zmesnjave besed.

Kot ste lahko opazili ze v zadnji novici, novembra ne bo novih stripov. Ce zelim spisati 3000 besed na dan je dokaj ocitno, da ne ostane ravno veliko casa se za kaj drugega. Poskusil pa bom, pisati ta blog/novice vsak dan, tako da bi se ustvaril nekaksen popis NaNoWriMo dogajanja, ne vem se zakaj bo to dobro, ampak skodovati ne more.

item.title: NaNoWriMo
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
NaNoWriMo is fast upon us with October coming to an end. It will be a hectic month of quick thinking and even quicker typing, many a caffeine will be consumed and ideas will flourish. In a word, fun.

The goal, as you may know, is to write an entire novel, or at least 50k words of it, in a single month. The task is not easy but it proved last year to be feasible as I came out with just over 55k words. The novel wasn't finished and I never got aroudn to finishing it nor to publishing. This year I have set a personal goal of 90k words which will be achieved by writing 3000 words a day, also feasible. But rather than writing a novel I will be writing a series of intraconnected novelas, which will in the end probably come out looking like chapters of a novel. On top of that, I have firmly decided to do everything in my power to get this work of fiction published and fulfill my long term dream of being a writer, whatever that may mean.

As you have probably noticed in the last news post there will be no new comic this month, now you know why, but I promise to try my best at making this blog something daily. The idea being that of daily reports on the progress of NaNoWriMo and everything around it. Hopefully it does not turn out boring.

item.title: Oktober
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Skrajni Äas Å¾e, da ta blog dobi en malÄek novejših vsebin. Je Å¾e skoraj smrdelo po plesnivem siru in trohneÄi barvi. Nasploh nelepo. Na Å¾alost pa niti ni kaj veliko za povedat, ker se paÄ ni prav veliko zgodilo, kaj Ämo.

Stran s povezavami je bila na manjši plastiÄni operaciji, upam, da bo lahko poplaÄala kredit. Sedaj je na splošno boljša, je pa obljubila, da si bo pridobila še pvoezave na nekaj drugih odliÄnih stripov, katerih avtorji pa ne dobavljajo lastnih banerjov, tako da, ker stvar rabi malo veÄ pozornosti, to preprosto še ni bilo postorjeno.



Cthulhu se je tudi zredil za še eno stran za Oktober, kar je še dobro, ker se je zgodilo nekako ravno na sredi meseca, kar pomeni, da je bil dogodek takorekoÄ ravno po naÄrtu. Redko a fascinantno.

Pripelje nas to torej do naslednje relativno pomembne teme. Pod novo stranjo lahko opazite, da datum naslednje rasti ni v Novembru, kot bi se priÄakovalo, ampak nekako šele v Decembru. Za taka hudodelstva so seveda dobri razlogi in zaobsegajo doloÄene dogodke, ki bodo potekali cel mesec. Seveda pa vam lahko Å¾e narava t.i cliffhangerja pove, da še ne boste zvedeli, kaj to pravzaprav je.

item.title: October
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
About time this blog got updated don't you think? Alas, though, there isn't much to be told as everything has been rather uneventful and all the blind fits of rage over matters worth ranting and raving about have long but passed and subsided without being blogged about.

The links page has gotten a bit of a facelift and should prove better now. There are plans to add some more links to it where the authors don't provide linking banners of their own, but seeing as taht's a tad more work to be done it hasn't gotten done yet.



Cthulhu has gotten a bit of an update for October, which is quite good because it got done smack in the middle of the month and that means it was almost exactly on schedule.

Which brings us to the next point on the agenda. You might notice that under the comic page it says the next one is to be upon you in December and not November as one woudl naturally assume. This has to be so because of some very amasingly awesome event that is to be going on all November, but I'll leave the details for the next blog post, some of you may already mostly know them, most probably not, but hey, that's what cliffhangers are for.

item.title: GledaliÅ¡Äe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Tu je stal preÄudovit tekst, ki pa ga je hudobni browser popapcal za kosilo, ali pa je bila mogoÄe veÄerja, kdo bi vedel. Preberete si lahko angleško verzijo, Äe le znate priti do nje in jo razumeti.

SovraÅ¾im izginotja...

item.title: Playhouse
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
When a person goes to the cinema to watch af ilm they might feel a slight tingle, maybe even feel like they have seen something really good, at some special moment they might even feel engulfed by the action. But when they go to the playhouse it's a whole different thing. The characters are right there, real, in front of you. The experience is always thrilling and astonishing no matter what your age, gender or taste is. In the playhouse the worst that can happen is that the performance is too artistic for you to understand. In the cinema the worst is being bored and falling asleep.

On Friday I have gone to see the first play in the repertoire of my season ticket at the national playhouse and I lvoed every little bit of it. At first it was a bit what the fuck but then the story sucked me in and it was difficult to get enough. An hour and a half in the short break was very welcome because for some odd reason there is no air conditioning in the hall, but after the whole two and a half hour play was over there was nothing but bewildering awe left in my mind. I could probably just go on and on about this but that would be rather pointless so I'll just state the thing that was the most noticable.

The actors were pretty standard, there simply aren't many to be found, and their performance, while good, nothing spectacular. What was really interesting about the whole set up was the scenography. Right fromt he start I could notice a theme; horizontal lines. The background was comprised fully of horizontal planks and when my gaze wondered upon the chairs on the stage I noticed them to be comprised of the same material. The one chair that was faced so you could only see its side had arm rests in order to adhere to the theme. For some strange reason even the sofa was visibly comprised of horizontal parts, which altogether made a very good effect. But I'll be damned if I can decypher it.

At the scene change, it was a real change, the background was still the same, but the foreground was now made entirely of curves and curvatures. Funnily enough even the happenings on stage seemed more curvy tahn angular and distant as they did before, everthing was more lovable, warm and near; as oposed to the former coldness and distancy.

All in all, when in the playhouse you can't expect anything but real artism everywhere and in every aspect of everything. Pure beauty.

item.title: RazpoloÅ¾enja
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
V majhnih urah jutra razpet si med sencami modrega in temino Å¾ivo rdeÄega. Ne moreš odloÄiti se ali ustvarjal bi prava dela umetnosti ali lotil se del, ki ti jih šef s pomoÄjo puške nalaga. Obe moÅ¾nosti sta enako grozni in bi te pustili strganega in pretresenega do kosti.

Ampak eno lahko opraviš skorajda preprosto z aktivacijo programov, drugi pa zahteva, da magiÄno proizvedeš svetlobo iz mrtve svetilke in slabo postavljene neuporabne glavne luÄi. Kaj torej storiš? Å½diš v temi in se utapljaš v samopomilovanju seveda.

Dokler iz predala ne pride mimo osupljiva stripknjiga in ti ukrade delÄek umirajoÄe pozornosti. SkoÄi vate v vsej svoji mogoÄnosti in ko izveš, da je stripar tudi tisti glasbenik Äigar glasbi prisluškuješ Å¾e veÄ tednov, si toplo preseneÄen in vesel.

In potem, ko listaš in listaš, odkriješ še polno gostujoÄih striparjev, ki so na knjigi pustili svoj osupljivi peÄat, ljudje kot Maxwell Atoms in drugi podobni geniji... knjiga je preprosto vredna vse tvoje ljubezni in obÄudovanja.

item.title: Moods
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
At small hours of the morning you are torn between the shadows of blue and the darkness of bright red. You cannot decide whether to perform true works of art or to go do the work your employer is making you do at gun point. Both are equally sinister and both will leave you torn and shaken to the bone.

But one you can do fairly easily by simply running a few applications, the other requires you to magically produce light from an unworking desklamp and an oddly positioned useless main lamp. What do you do? Sit in the dark and wallow in self pity of course.

Until an amazing comic book from an awesome artist comes along out of the drawer and captures your dwindling attention. It jumps at you with all it's glory and when you learn the one who makes it also the author of all that awesome music you've been listening to for weeks you are warmly surprised and happy.

Then when you flip the pages around you notice amazing guest comics from people like Maxwell Atoms and other such geniouses. The book really is worthy of all your love.

item.title: Umetnost
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Torej dragi pesnik
na koncu te bo pobralo
niÄ ne bo od tebe ostalo
le kupÄek pepela
in pesmi starih.

Umetnost, kaj sploh je umetnost? VeÄina bi sklepala, da je to edina dolgo trajajoÄa stvar, ki jo Äloveštvo ustvari. Najstarejši znani dokazi o Äloveštvu so bili svoje Äase le navadna umetnost, obrt, s katero so se ukvarjali neznani umetniki o katerih nihÄe niÄesar ne ve. Seveda ne, bili so le navadne gorile višjega uma. Uma, ki pogine še prej kakor telo, ki ga vklenja. Ja um; prvi podleÅ¾e perverzijam navadnega Å¾ivljenja, toda v nekaterih uspe preÅ¾iveti dovolj dolgo, da se udejanji v stvari, ki ji pravimo umetnost.

Kot ste nekateri mogoÄe Å¾e opazili, je bila pred polnimi petimi deli stvar imenovana strip obnovljena. Nov del, nove neumnosti privrejo iz uma blazneÅ¾ev. Ampak novic, o ne, tega pa le nihÄe ne posodobi, vse novice, stare, smrdljive naravnost crkujoÄe. Vsi poroÄajo le še o neumnostih, katere nobenega normalnega Äloveka ne zanimajo. Kje je kdo, ki se sploh še trudi ljudem prinesti Äesarkoli vredne novice? Prazne marnje in krvaveÄe blodnje, koga briga!

item.title: Art
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
So, dear poet
in the end you shall perish
naught will resist
but a pile of ash
and poems old.

Art, what is art? People would conclude that it is the only longlasting aspect of humanity. Why the oldest known relics and what have you were mere art at the time of their conception. But is there anything known of the creators? Of course not, they were mere henchman of the higher being that is mind. The mind that perishes even sooner than the body that entraps it. Yes, the mind, it is the first to sucumb to the deadly perversions of life; in a select few it persists long enough to transfer onto a lasting enough medium to be remembered in the form of pretty art.

As some of you may have noticed the so called comic that resides on this website has been updated a whopping five days ago on an odd Sunday. But the news, oh no, not the news, who updates the news. I mean really, still the news is always only about the vain stupidity of nothing very interesting. There is no real constraint as to what is considered important news anymore, people just get fed some utter bullshit and love it.

item.title: Pirati
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
V zadnjem èasu je internetno pazljivo oko se ¾e davno umaknilo s Piratov 2, ampak nekateri smo si jih ogledali šele v soboto in zganili svoje riti šele danes, da bi o njih kaj povedali, c'est la vie.

Te¾ko se je odloèiti kam toèno bi uvrstil Pirate 2, na eni strani sem jaz, ljubitelj filmov, ki se dobro poslušajo, se pravi so prijetni za muziciranje v ozadju, na drugi strani pa sem jaz, ljubitelj posebnih efektov in velikih reèi. Prvi pirati so definitivno film, ki se odlièno posluša, veliko dobrega in zanimivega dialoga, ne preveè moteèih elementov in odlièna glasbena podlaga. Pirati 2 to definitivno niso, so èisto nasprotje tega, Pirati 2 so spektakel in za kaj veè bi jih bilo te¾ko jemati. Film je gledljiv nekako v stilu kot je gledljiv na primer Rambo, kaj veè bi pa bilo te¾ko prièakovati.

Kar se tièe samih posebnih uèinkov pa kapo dol. vse skupaj je odlièno izpeljano, uporabljena je zanimiva tehnika, ki je tokrat res prinesla 3D animacije v takih detajlih kot verjetno še lep èas ne bodo standard v filmih. Bral sem tudi nekaj èlankov o postopku dela in stvar je res sapo jemajoèa.


Prišli smo torej do dela novice, ki se dotika septemberskega stripa, še vedno mi je ¾al za poletje brez novih delov.

Strip je dobil lasten storyboard, ki je sluèajno tudi moj prvi. V izdelavo še ni šel, ker moram najprej ustvariti tri dizajne ter se ponovno nauèiti kako se nariše nekatere dotiène stvari, ki so se mi uspele nekako izmuzniti. Mislim, da lahko z skorajšnjo gotovostjo reèem, da bo strip narejen ob pravem èasu, kdaj toèno ta èas je pa naj ostane skrivnost.

item.title: Pyrates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The internet's watchful eye has taken its eye off Pyrates 2 but c'est la vie, I only got to see it on Saturday and have only gotten around to saying something about it today.

It's hard to decide what to say about this movie, on one side there is the me that is a movie lover and judges movies by how listenable they are. That is to say, can you put the movie in the background and just hearken to it. The first Pirates certainly is such a movie, lots of dialogue and lovely music, awesome, the second, sadly, is far from this. It is a completely new breed of movie, rather then telling a great story with lots of dialogue it is action and special effects packed. It was fun to watch, but in the same way as Rambo was fun to watch... but just not that very great.

As far as the special effects go... hat's off. Very great work, have read a few articles on how they were done and I was simply amazed by how great it turned out to be.


Now we come already to the part of this news post that has to do with the progress of September's page, and I'm still very sorry about the summer being updateless.

The new page has been storyboarded (my first) and is well planned out, I just have some concept designs to make and re-learn a certain aspect of drawing which I seem to have misplaced along the way and I am feeling confident that the page will be finished on time... just when exactly on time is, I am not telling lest I jinx it.

item.title: Cthulhu
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
No, pa smo tam, novica, ki sem se pred njo skrival ¾e nekaj dni, mogoèe bi pa odšla in nikoli postala resnièna, èisto mogoèe; vendar ni bilo tako. Novica je tu, v vsej svoji velièastni grozi in neumnosti, novica, ki bo obšla svet, ali pa vsaj bralca ali dva.

Torej, brez nadanjega nodlašanja, ka¾e da je gospod Cthulhu postal zelo neèimern, saj se je, kot ka¾e, odloèi, da jo zagode risarju èe nima dovolj velike vloge v nekem dotiènem stripu; stripu, ki se je ustvarjal popolnoma predolgo in je bil zakasnjen, prestavljen, zbrisan mrtev, zaklan in poškodovan... nazadnje pa tudi odpovedan. Res je, prav ste prebrali, odloèil sem se, da stripa ne bo. Popolno unièenje mojega truda se ni zgodilo enkrat, ne, zgodilo se je dvakrat, in ko se je zgodilo drugiè me je vse minilo. Odloèil sem se, da bom preprosto opustil prekleti strip in se raje lotil naslednjega.

Torej sedaj, ko je stran brez stripa, se bom posvetil ustvarjanju dnevnih skic... dnevno O.o ... in se kmalu lotil izdelave novega stripa, po mo¾nosti ne prekletega, ki bo izšel septembra.

item.title: Cthulhu
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Here we go, the news I've been dreading to tell for some days now, but it has to be told and I have to bear the stupidity of it all, so no use postponing, oh no, no use for that at all, nope, no use. Stopping procrastination mode... now.

The bad news, yes it is a piece of rather bad news, rancid ones almost. The news in question is that Cthulhu seems to have grown rather vain and has decided to mess with the artist if he doesn't get enough of an appearance in a certain comic. The comic in question is the page that has been going on rather long enough and has been delayed postponed, dead and broken and finally... canceled. Yes that's right, I've decided to simply not finish the page. Some force has ruined my work not once, but twice and when it happened last Thursday I finally decided... you know what... screw this.

Without the page I will take care to produce daily sketches... daily and will be starting work on September's page rather soonly and hopefully that one will fare better than the canceled one.

item.title: Pisalo
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Obstajajo ljudje, ki jim je pravzaprav vseeno kaksno pisalo uporabljajo, samo da pise v pravi barvi. Potem pa so tu se ljudje, ki jim je zelo pomembno kaksno pisalo imajo. Osebno spadam v drugo vrsto, ne vem zakaj tocno, ampak opazam, da z uporabo tocno dolocenega pisala tocno dolocene debeline pride do preprosto najboljsih rezultatov. Danes je pisalo umrlo. Res je, take stvari se pac dogajajo, nic posebnega. Ampak kdo bi si lahko mislil, da je tako tezko priti do zeljenega pisala.

Najprej sem sel v trgovino, kjer ponavadi rastejo in se razmnozujejo. Na zalost jim je zmanjkalo prave debeline, zato sem sel v drugo, kjer jih sploh nimajo, v tretji pa sem koncno dobil iskano ...

Se nekaj zelo zanimivega se je zgodilo danes, v posti me je pricakalo prav lepo vabilo na nek literarni natecaj za kratko zgodbico. Bil sem prijetno presenecen in ker zahtevajo 1000 besed dolgo zgodbo na doloceno temo, jo bodo seveda tudi dobili.

item.title: Pen
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
There are some people don't really care about what kind of pen they use, just as long as it writes in the correct colour. And then there are people whom fuss quite some about the kind of pen they use. I am one of the latter, not sure why really, but I find that using the specific type of pen I got accustomed to is simply the best thing for writing by hand. Today the pen died. Nothing major, happens all the time right? It does, but I would never have imagined how hard it can be to get a new pen just like it (but new of course).

Went to the store where the pens usually reside and they were fresh out of the thickness I need, then I went to another store and was told they don't at all have such pens and the third store, finally, gave me the pen I needed. Thank you capitalism and desire to sate the customer!

Something very lovely also happened today, I got a personal notification of some writing contest directly into my e-mail inbox. It was a surprising event and a very nice one at that. They demand a 1000 word story on a specific topic and by Imhotep they are going to get it.

item.title: Intuos
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Danes sem kupil novega Wacom Intuos3 iz preprostega razloga, da sem si ze dolgo zelel necesa podobnega in ker kupcek denarja ni bil dovolj velik za svoj prvotni namen, je preprosto lezal ta in pocel nic, bolje torej, da se ga zapravi za nekaj.

Nisem se imel veliko casa poigrati se s stvarjo, samo eno majhno slicico, ampak reci, da po prvotnih tezavah privajanja, ki ga bo se nekaj, opazam, da je risanje veliko lazje kot z misko in samo cas bo lahko povedal koliko lazje in hitreje bo sedaj risati strip.

item.title: Intuos
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Today I've bought a new Wacom Intuos3 simply for the reason that I've wanted a pen tablet for quite a while now and that since I don't have enough money to buy what it was originally meant to buy it was just sitting there doing nothing, might as well spend it on something.

So far I've only created one image with it and after the initial trouble of getting used to it, and probably I'll get used to it even more, it was quite fascinating to use. It is much different from using a mouse and only time will tell how quicker and easier the comics will be produced now.

item.title: Strah in trepet
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
V petek me je moja najljubsa knjigarna obvestila, da je bila moja kopija knjige Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas prispela in jo lahko pridem iskat, ko se mi pac zljubi. Razlog, da sem knjigo sploh narocil, lezi v dejstvu, da je film po istem naslovu, v katerem igra Depp, eden najboljsih filmov, kar sem jih kdaj videl.

Ko sem knjigo koncno prejel, me je zanimiva naslovnica takoj zvabila v svoje mreze in se zdaj ne vem kdo je pravzaprav na njej upodobljen, Depp ali zares Thompson, ampak saj to v bistvu niti ni vazno. Knjiga je bila, po resnici povedano, tako zelo dobra, da sem jo se isti petek prebral od platnice do platnice in uzival v vsakem trenutku. Edina stvar, ki se mi je zdela malce nenavadna je, da ni knjiga nic drugacna od filma in je film celo zelo odlicna interpretacija le-te. Seveda so z lahkoto opazni manjsi spremenjeni detajli, kak dialog narejen bolj zanimiv oz. gostobeseden in naracija malo manj dolgovezna, ker se dogajanje pac vidi. Kar se pa tice tistega duha in ideje knjige pa ne more nihce ugovarjati.

Torej, kot povzetek, knjiga je odlicna in branje priporocam vsakomur.

item.title: Fear and Loathing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
On Friday I was notified by my favourite bookshop that my copy of Fear and Loathing In Las Vegas had arrived and that it is now available for pick up. The reason I had ordered the book was that the film starring Johnny Depp was, well, amazingly awesome and I wanted to see what the book was like.

When I got the book I was immediatelly lured in by the interesting cover and I will probably never know if the mauled image is that of Depp or Thompson, but then again it doesn't really matter. The book was actually so good that I read it cover to cover in that same Friday. What struck me as a bit odd was that the book is no different to the film, there are of course minor differences in dialogue and some shortenings in the film. But usually after reading the book a film was made from you go Bloody hell, the film sucked compared to this, they left out too much. In this case it was more like Oh wow, the film is such a great enterpretation of the book it's uncanny.

So all in all, the book was very good and I recommend everyone to give it a good read.

item.title: Hobi
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Nekateri ljudje izberejo najbolj cudne stvari za hobije. Vzemimo za primer te zmesane gimnasticarje, imajo stiri ure treningov na dan, pet dni v tednu in kjer bi mi temu rekli tezko, naporno delo, oni temu pravijo odlicen sproscujoc hobi in ga opravljajo iz ciste ljubezni do ... cesarkoli jim je pac vsec pri vsem skupaj.

Tu je torej na vse zmesane norce v svetu in stvari, ki jih pocno. *dvigne kelih*

item.title: Hobby
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Some people choose the oddest things as their hobbies. Just look at these crazy gymnasts, they have four hours of practice a day, five days a week, and whereas most of us would call such strenous excercise hard, difficult, backbraking work, these nutters call it a rather pleasurable hobby, and they do it all out of pure love for... well for whatever they love about it.

Here's to crazy nutters doing silly things all their lives *raises chalice*

item.title: Napredek?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Pred nekaj dnevi sem razmisljal o napredku Slovenscine in opazil nekaj mocno zanimivega in morda malo strasnega. Izgleda, da obstaja neko nagnjenje k prevzemanju in kraji besed neslovenskega izvora. Tako so v casu nasih prababic vsi uporabljali neke nemske spacenke in jih prav lepo uporabljali v vsakodnevnem jeziku. Zdaj se nam, mlajsmi, to seveda zdi absurdno in uporaba nemscine je nekaj, kar pocno neizobrazeni kmetje. O ne, mi smo boljsi, mi v svoj sleng dodajamo vsevrste angleskih izrazov, ki so tako zelo veliko boljsi od spacenih angleskih kajneda? Opazite, da je ze sama beseda sleng angleskega izvora?

Torej kaj za vraga pocnemo s to bogo slovenscino? Ali jo ubijamo sami, ali nam jo velike mocne sile tlacijo v nasa uboga majhna grla?

Se ena zelo zabavna stvar pri napredku je statistika letosnjega NaNa. Bisri opazovalec bo namrec tako jopazil, da je bilo v prvih dveh dneh napisanih priblizno 5500 besed, v naslednjih trinajstih pa komaj vec kot 5000. Upam, mocno upam, da v temu ni nekaksnega vzorca, ki me bo preganjal se do konca meseca. Dobro pa je recimo to, da je prislo do prve objave mojega dela v reviji, sicer spletni in samo odlomka, ampak zacetek pa je.

item.title: Progress?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A few days ago I was contemplating the development of Slovene as a language and found something strikingly fascinating and perhaps a bit scary. There appears to exist a certain tendency to adopt nonslovene words in common speech and to do that a lot. An interesting observation thus provides itself that in the time of our grandmothers a lot of the words in common speech were stolen from German in one form or another. Now there is a tendency to consider use of such words as quaint, old and overly uneducated. Oh no, us younger people do the same with English, except we call it slang and think of ourselves as having invented something completely new and awesome. We are teh bomb, as you could say, where our forefathers hurt the language with German we do it with English.

So what the hell, are we killing ourselves? Or are the powers of great strength mangling our wee minds into submission?

Another thing about progress that's really amusing is how I've written 5500ish words of this year's NaNo in the first two days, and the 13 days after that received what, only just above 5000 words? Oh yes, there most hopefully is not a pattern in there somewhere. A good thing though is that I got my first publish in a magazine, an electronic one and just an excerpt, but hey, it's the first one.

item.title: 15% manj
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ljudje so zmesani, ampak ne mislim na obicajen misantropicen nacin ljudje so zmesani, mislim resno, kot zivalska vrsta, so ljudje preprosto zmesani. Samo poglejte kaj se zgodi, ko neka velka korporacija podari 15% popust na vse izdelke na neko doloceno nedeljo, ki je slucajno danes. Vrste so bile daljse, kot sem jih videl kdajkoli v zivljenju, kaj sele na nedeljo. Skoraj se ni bilo nikjer premikati in mislil sem ze, da sem zasel v kolonijo mrozev na soncarskem izletu. Zmesano.

Hm, kaj se je se zgodilo danes, aja saj res. Odkril sem odlicen nacin za odlaganje pisanja, zanimivo je koliko se povprecen pisatelj v bistvu potrudi samo, da bi se izognil strasnemu sindormu prazne strani. Ok, je res, moje strani niso vec ravno prazne, pa tudi idej ni manjkalo, ampak nekaj najbolj groznega je, ko se vsedes in se lotis pisati. Zato sem danes porabil veliko ur in koncno naredil namizje lepo in nasploh odlicno okolje za delo.

Ce ga res zelite videti, ga lahko tu, vendar je zelo zelo velika slika.

item.title: 15% off
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
People are crazy, and I don't just mean your average misanthrophic people are crazy, I mean to say that as a species they are really really crazy. Just look at what happens when a large store decides to give a 15% discount on all their products on one specific Sunday that happens to be today. It's crazy, there were people bloody everywhere, I've never in my life seen queues that long, let alone on a Sunday. Moving around was so difficult I almost thought I was visiting a walrus colony on a sunbathing trip. Crazy!

So what else happened, oh yeah, I found a really great way to procrastinate writing, it is trully amazing to what lengths writers will go to avoid the dreaded empty page syndrome. Ok so my pages aren't empty anymore and ok yes I did have ideas on how to continue, but it's just that difficult to do just that. So I wasted hours upon hours on making my desktop pretty and a generally awesome place to work in. It's much cleaner now and all that.

If you really want to, you can see it here, but it's a large large image.

item.title: Impulzivnost
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Danes se je izkazal za nekaj zelo impulzivnega in nenavadnega, saj je bilo kar nekaj dogodkov, ki so se pripetili na cisti bazi impulzov.

Tako je na primer prislo do nakupa novih las, s katerimi sem spremenil svojo glavo in moram reci da je izpadlo kar v redu. Spremembe je bila velika, saj so lasje spremenili iz dolzine do mojih moskih josk na malo krajse kot do brade. Vse skupaj se je tudi zgodilo na pravi nacin hecnih oseb, ker sem tja prisel in iz zepa potegnil sliko Deppa iz filma Secret Window in rekel, naj mi naredijo take lase ter jih tudi dobil.

Druga stvar pa je bilo nenaden nakup najbednejsega med bednimi casopisi v drzavi (Direkt) samo zato, ker je bil zraven DVD Fawlty Towers. Malo sem se sicer opekel ker so na njem le tri epizode pa se to ne v prevec dobri kvaliteti ...

item.title: Impulse day
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
As it would appear today was a very impulsive day as there were many things that occured on pure impulse.

One of such things was the idea to go and get some new hair to crown my head with and it really turned out quite well, I like it and it's a nice, although huge, change. It was done in a true silly person manner as well, when I got there I pulled out a screencap of Depp from Secret Window and said that I wanted that. Promptly enough the hair went from nipple length to just short of chin length.

The other thing was an impulse buy of the trashiest of trashy newspapers the country has to offer for the reason of getting a Fawly Towers DVD. Sad part is I got burned and it only contains 3 episodes and those in not too good quality, stupid thing.

item.title: Lepo
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Vceraj je bilo porabljenega veliko casa za poskus nastavitve Xgl, ki je graficni server za linux in omogoca zelo fensi ucinke in mahinacije z okenskim okoljem. Omogoca v bistvu, da okolje zgleda podobno kot Mac OS X ali Aero na Visti. Res je, popapca veliko resorsov ampak je odlicen za pogledat, hotel sem pravzaprav samo malo pogledati, obljubim.

Na zalost pa se je pripetilo tako, da ga nisem uspel nastaviti in tisto enkrat, ko sem celo prisel do namizja in ostalih pritiklin je bil racunalnik tako pocasen, da je bil popolnoma neuporaben. Kot bi skusal poganjati Win98 na 486ki. Za gresna kozla sta bila izbrana pocasna maticna ploca in pocasen CPU.

Govoril sem z urednikom Locutia, spletne literarne revije, ki obstaja ze kar nekaj casa in ima lepo stran. Zmenila sva se, da objavi eno mojo zgodbo, ali odlomek le-te, kar je super, vendar je nekaj se bolj odlicnega. Podal je obsirno in zelo poglobljeno kritiko mojega dela, kar mi bo zelo pomagalo pri izboljsanju svojega sloga in izraznosti, ni boljsega za zacetnika kot je dobra kritika.

item.title: Pretty
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Yesterday a lot of time has gone into trying to get Xgl to work. It is a graphics server for linux that enables you to have some pretty spiffy looking things going on when you're using the computer much like you can in Mac OS X and Aero in Vista. Yes, it is very resource hungry but I really just wanted to give it a go and maybe perhaps if it doesn't kill the computator too much to use it constantly.

Alas it has turned out that I didn't manage to get it working and the one time I did log in and almost managed to work with it the computer was so slow it was useless. Like trying to run Win98 on a IBM 486, or perhaps worse. The flaw got blamed on the slow motherboard and CPU and the correct configurations were put back to work with regular 2D Xorg.

I spoke to the editor of Locutio, which is an online literature magazine that seems to have been around for quite a while, and I have to say I like how the website looks. He agreed to publish a story of mine or an excerpt of it, which is great, but what was really awesome was the extensive and very constructive criticism of my writing which will help me grow as a writer and really inhance my style. It's things like these that really mean a lot to a beginer.

item.title: Jecanje
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ne vem kaj je bolj bedno, igra, ki sem jo danes videl, ali napredek mojega nanowrima, ampak katerokoli je, je bedno toliko, da jecam. Zgleda, da sem bil porinjen v nadleznostno pisateljsko blokado, ki ni posledica nezmosnosti pisanja, niti ne izvira iz pomankanja idej in Oziris pomagaj nima korena v nevoljanosti pisanja. Preprost razlog je, da vedno, ko se spravim pisat, pride nekaj vmes in me od tega odvrne, pa naj bo to nova epizoda super nanizanke, ali pa nekaj tako preprostega, kot je obisk kavarne z ljudmi namesto sam in iz tega sledoca neizvedljivost pisanja.

Kar se tice igre, ki sem jo omenil, bila je to stvar, v katero sem bil prisiljen. Ogledali smo si jo s solo in smrdela je ravno toliko kot, ko sem si pred dvemi leti ogledal isto predstavo z istimi igralci in z isto kolicino nesmiselnosti in neuzitka. Zgodba je preprosto zanic in osebe so nezanimive, edina stvar, ki igri nekako povzdigne gledljivost je glavni igralec, ki svojo vlogo odigra odlicno in je celo zanimiv, skoda le, da besede, ki jih govori, niso. Podobno je kot kako Johnny Depp vsako svojo vlogo naredi odlicno, cetudi to pravzaprav ni.

Nekaj odlicnega, kar sem danes videl, pa je tudi zadnja epizoda prve sezone internetne nanizanke Pure Pwnage, ki jo priporocam v ogled vsem, ki berete te besede.

item.title: Slurring
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
I'm not sure what sucks more, the play I've seen today or my nanowrimo progress, but whichever it is, it sucks so much it makes me slurr. It would appear that I am suffering from a bit of an annoyance writer's block. See the problem isn't in the inability to write, it isn't even in the lack of ideas or Osiris forbid unwantingness to write. It is pure and simple that whenever I intend on writing some there is something that will prevent it. Be it a good show that's just produced a new episode, computer trouble or hell, going to the tea shop with people rather than alone and thus being unable to write, whatever it is, it's bloody annoying.

About the play I mentioned, it was a thing I was forced into going to see with school and as it did two years ago, when I saw the exact same play by the exat same actors, it sucked. I didn't enjoy the story much, nor really the message behind its tale. What I did enjoy, though, was the performance of the main role, it was done very well and it was almost fun to watch, sadly the words were not. Much like Johnny Depp and how he makes some roles simply work only because of him. Oh, not to forget, the play was Look Back In Anger.

Something very great that I've seen today was the final episode of season one by the great show of Pure Pwnage, I suggest everyone reading this blog to go and see it and if you haven't already to also watch the rest of the episodes, they're marvelous.

item.title: Ah sranje
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Vceraj je bil, kot kaze, okoli naokoli in oh in sploh slab dan. Bil sem prezaposlen s spanjem pred televizijo v dnevni sobi, da bi napisal kako misel v "dnevni" blog in v upanju, da se kaj podobnega ne ponovi danes, ga pisem ze tako zgodaj kot ob 1700 ... kot da je to tako zelo zgodaj, ampak hej, vse je super ce je blog napisan.

Na zalost, ne. Zaradi te ali one stvari se je po cistem nakljucju zgodilo tako, da ze od petka nisem napisal vsega skupaj vec kot 1000 besed, kar me postavi tako dalec za nacrti, da je prevec strasno sploh izracunati pravzaprav kako dalec. Cisto po pravici, mislim, da bi v tem trenutku bilo brezsmiselno se prevec nervrirati okoli stevila besed, saj bi to povzrocilo razpolozenje, ki sploh ni primerno za delo. Osredotocil se bom, torej, na pisanje samo in pustil stetje besed za drugic.

Po drugi strani pa sem danes v soli uspel napisati celih 300 besed ... juhu .. na zalost je to tudi vse kar sem danes uspel napisati ...

item.title: Oh shit
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Yesterday was an all over bad day it would seem, I was preoccupied with sleeping in front of the telly to write this blog and in hopes of such a coincidentiality being avoided today I'm writing as early as 1700 ... as if that was super early, but hey, all is well if the blog is done right?

Sadly, no. Due to some thing or another I haven't managed to write even a thousand words all since Friday and yeah, you guessed it, that's really bad, I'm too daunted by the fact to even calculate just how much behind schedule I am, it's that scary. In all factuality I believe that fussing about wordcount at this moment would cause too much "omg" to provide a good working atmosphere, so I'll rather focus on writing as much as is possible and hope for the best.

On the other hand ... I did manage to write a whooping 300 words at school today, which acciedentally also happens to be the complete wordcount of today so far.

item.title: Updates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Wanted to add nifty new features to the website and update the basic script and I somehow managed to bork most of the configurations and thus removed all the sidebars and static pages in a single swipe. Also installing the new modules isn't going as smoothly as I had hoped due to a bug being discovered in the installation script of Chlorine Boards.

Bottom line is I can't be arsed right now to keep cracking my head with this so I'll finish fixing the site tomorrow. Sory for the inconvenience this causes anyone.

item.title: Zombi smrt
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Internet je preplavljen z zombijevsko okuzbo in nasa dolznost je, da osvobodimo svet mrtve tiranije. Ce zelis pri tem cilju pomagati pojej modro tableto in pojdi sem.

item.title: Zombie death
item.dc:creator: admin

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Vsi imajo radi hitre avte kajne? No vsi normalni. In vsi radi skrbijo za okolje v katerem zivimo? No, to je vsaj trenutna moda. Poglejte si torej to sexy bestijo, tako je sexy, da jo hocem.

item.title: Ecology in style
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Everybody loves roadsters right? Well everybody sane. And everybody likes to take care of the place we live in? Well it does seem to be the fad these days. Take a look at this lovely beast, it's so lovely I want one.

item.title: Ideje
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Nekje okoli poldneva danes sem imel odlicno idejo za blog, vendar se je uspela utopiti v morju matematike, ki je v doticnem trenutku polnilo mojo glavo. Na koncu sem se, tako kot ponavadi, boril z mozgani za idejo kaj naj pravzaprav pisem. V chatu je ravno takrat nekdo omenil palacinke in moj um je takoj veselo poskocil, saj palacinke so pa ja bloga vredna naprava.

Raje pa sem se odlocil pisati o idejah samih. Kaj je pravzaprav ideja? Kaj je tisto, kar pripravi lastnika, da ob doloceni misli poskoci in rece Hej, to je pa ideja! v vsem skupaj ni nobene logike. In zakaj so pravzaprav nekatere ideje dobre, nekatere pa slabe ... ceprav je to dokaj lahko vprasanje. Kar pa ni lahko vprasanje je, od kje ideje sploh prihajajo?

Veliko umetnikov verjame, da si lastijo tako imenovano Muzo, ki poskrbi za vedno svez dotok novih idej in zamisli. Ampak ali ima res kaj pri vsem skupaj? Ali sploh kdaj naredi kaj vec, kot sedi na svoji riti in te gleda, ko svicas za ideje? Odgovor je ne, sploh ne. Muza je samo dober izgovor na katerega lahko umetnik zvrne svoj uspeh, saj globoko v sebi se vsak boji uspeha, ker bi v koncni fazi to pomenilo totalno odgovornost za samega sebe, pomenilo bi, da ni usode, ni boga, ni nicesar razen nepomemnih nas.

Zavedam se, da temu postu manjka pravi konec, ampak moja muza je sla na sekret.

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Somewhere around midday today I had a wonderful idea for a blog post, but it managed to drown in the sea of maths that was filling my head at the time. So I was really struggling to find an idea about what to blog. Then in chat someone mentioned pancakes and immediately my mind frolicked as it thought pancakes are a trully awesome device and should be blogged about.

But instead of that I decided to blog about ideas. Because what exactly is an idea? What is it about a certain thought that makes the owner go Hey, that was an idea it makes little logical sense. Or why is it that some ideas are good and some aren't, but then again that's not very hard to answer. What is hard to answer, though, is where ideas come from.

Many artists believe they have a so called Muse in their possession that comes up with good ideas for them. But does it really? Does it really do anything more than sit around on its arse and look at you while you sweat for ideas? The answer is, no, no it does not. The Muse is just a good excuse to blame somebody else for one's own success because in the long term everyone fears being responsible for themselves, it would mean there is no faith, no god, no nothing, just little old unimportant us.

I realise this post lacks a punchline, but my Muse went to the toilet.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: uhm.. poke? O.o

item.title: Neumna vsebina
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ko te dni gledamo po straneh kot je Youtube, opazimo shrljivo pomanjkanje zanimivih vsebin. V osnovi so bile narejene za deljenje videov oz. bi si tako vsaj lahko mislili, vsi pa bi se strinjalil, da so to glasbeni videi, odlomki iz tu in tam in seveda, je marsikaj takega. Vse prevec pa je neumnih stvari, ki jih ljudje posnamejo sami in dajo na internet preprosto ker lahko.

Vsi poznamo nevarnosti gledanja domacih videov in tega nihce ne mara, edino hujsi so umetniski videi mladih studentvo, ki vztrajajo na vecnih poskusih umetniskega ustvarjanja, na koncu pa ustvarijo negledljivo sranje, ki konec koncev ni niti kaj prevec globoko.

Potem pa so tu se dobre stvari. Ena takih je naprimer video cloveka, ki v desetih korakih ponazori odpiranje kozarca, ali pa prijetna razprava o Pachelbelovem Canon v D. To so dobre stvari, ki so celo zelo legalne za biti na internetu ... zakaj torej ni veliko veliko vec takih?

item.title: Silly content
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Looking through websites like youtube these days a person gets frightened by the complete lack of decent videographic content on them. They were originally created to share videos, or at least that's what someone might think, but you'd agree that means music videos, clips from here and there, and sure, there are quite some of those. But there is much too many stupid things people shoot themselves and put online simply because they can.

Everyone knows the danger of watching home videos and nobody really likes to watch them, the only thing worse are young film arts students with their crap that's simply unwatchable as they try far too hard to be artistic but produce something that is neither watchable nor meaningful.

And then there are good things. Like a video that perfectly describes jar opening, it's silly, yes, but it's also very true and entertaining. Or the video of a man ranting about Pachelbel's Canon in D. These are good videos, they are also very legal to be online ... so please people, why aren't there many many more like this?

item.title: Boobies
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Firstly I should just mention that due to untranslatability this post will be available only in English and since that means it doesn't have to be written twice it might get a bit long, but then again it might not, who could really tell in advance right ... you have been warned.

Have you ever thought about how many words there are for naughty human bits? Well I would wager most languages do this but english seems especially creative with inventing obscure meraphors to name things like breasts or genitalia, and who could blame it really, it's fun to make up words and only denote what you mean by tone of voice or context.

I'm not sure why, but in the mouth of a skilled vocaliser pretty much any word can sound naughty and practically any word can have a meaning of, let's say juggs, when used properly. Hell, there are millions of them ranging all the way from the very clinical breasts to juicy twins. Practically any round item can be used as a metaphor for the wretched sacks of blubber ... like melons or oranges.

Yes, of course, they aren't direct synonyms, which is probably what gives the whole mess reason to live really, because who would want to use words that mean exactly the same ... that's right, nobody. Each of the metaphors speaks of a bit different boobs, but in the long run they're all still just breasts.

When you think about it though, most of the words really don't fit the subject at hand at all. Breasts is too stiff and clinical, juggs just sounds too dirty and boobs simply doesn't have enough syllables even tho

ugh it is rather rounded - comes out too hard. The only word that does them justice is boobies, because let's face it, the word simply symbolises what it represents in all possible ways possible.

There are two syllables, representing the duality of the subject matter, it is filled with round sounds like b and o, and hell, even the lovable l flows nicely and roundly off the tongue. The ie is a sound of, well it's difficult to explain, but it makes the word whole. It makes the word roll off your tongue nicely and without any hassle ... just like boobies should in the hands of a skilled practitioner, round, soft and smooth ...

But anyway, the point at hand is that there are few words in english that sound so beautiful and so wholly symbolise their meaning. The only phrase that comes close in sound to boobies is cellar door and nobody can really say just why that sounds so nice.

 

In after thought, I wonder if all this talk about boobies and sex will make google find me easier ... it just might, everybody knows google is so popular because it's the single biggest source of free porn online.

item.title: Piskoti
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Torej je bozic, ali nek tak pomemben potrosniski praznik, ki je bil izmalicen do glupe nerazpoznavnosti in nikomur starejsemu od dvanajst pravzaprav vec nic ne pomeni.

Odlocil sem se torej, da to storim malo drugace kot drugi in namesto nekega plozanja o bozicu in blablabla raje povem nekaj resnic o piskotih. Res je, hotel sem imati ta pogovor z opecno steno ze pred nekaj casa, ampak ga pac nisem. Piskoti so zlobna vrsta, cesarkoli pac ze so. Skoraj sem preprican, da prihajajo iz neke oddaljene galaksije in so okuzili nase mozgane z majhnimi virusi, zaradi katerih delamo vedno vec teh zlobnih bitij. Po mojih opazanjih se sirijo tako, da jih zive pojemo, kar nespremenljivo povzorci zeljo, da jih pojemo se vec. Scasoma ta zlobna zelja zavzame celo zrtev dokler ni zavzeta toliko, da zacne ustvarjati nove piskote.

Ko bo preteklo dovolj casa, sem preprican, bodo piskoti zavzeli cel svet in ustvarili kolonijo, ki bo pocasi zavzela venero ali kamorkoli je ze pobegnil preostali del clovestva, scasoma ne bo vec vesolja, samo se en velik piskot.

item.title: Cookies
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
So it's christmas or some other very important consumerist holiday of some expensive sort, and so what. Everyone does christmas blogs or comics or even both and it's all rather turned into some shit nobody really cares about anymore, at least nobody older than twelve.

So I decided to do this a bit differently, I will talk to you about the evil that are cookies. Yes, I have meant for this little chat with a brick wall to take place a while ago, but alas it simply did not. Cookies, they are a vile species of, whatever the hell they are. I am almost certain they come from some unrully galaxy far far away and have infested our brain with little virii that make us produce more and more of the evil beings. Acording to my observation they spread by being eaten alive, which invariably produces a desire to eat more. In time this evil need consumes the whole victim until it is consumed so much it starts producing more cookies.

When enough time will pass I am certain cookies will take over the world and create a colony that will slowly infest venus or wherever the rest of humanity has run off to and eventually there will be no more space, just a giant crumbly delicious cookie.

item.title: Mraz
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Zunaj se je shladilo, povprecna temperatura prejsnjega tedna je bila okoli 15°C, ta teden pa gravitira bolj na 0°C ... hvala ti globalno segrevanje, ljubimo te, res. Ampak, resno, mraz je super, veliko boljsi je kot vrocina. Tezko bi se odlocil zakaj, mogoce zaradi vse zabave, ki jo izluscim iz dejstva, da sem normalno oblecen, mogoce pa je preprosto zato, ker se ne pripeti na vsakem koraku, da bi razgaljene prsi hotele iztakniti moje oci. Hud mraz je pa seveda zelo slab, ponavadi tudi bolec, ampak hudega mraza tu tako skoraj nikoli ni.

Je pa z mrazom povezanih nekaj unikatnih problemov, ki jih v toplem vremenu ni. Tako imamo na primer vedno prisotno nizko sonce, ki se trudi ubiti oci vseh, ki ga gledajo, je pac nevzgojeno in neotesano. Drugi pa je, da moj najljubsi prostor za pridobivanje caja nikoli nima casa zame, vedno je polno zaseden, se sploh kadar jaz potrebujem caj. Caj je odlicen, lepo se usedes in lahko v miru ustvarjas, ampak to je zelo otezeno ce ne mores do caja ...

item.title: Cold
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Yes, it got cold outside, last week the average temperature was 15°C and now this week around 0°C ... thank you global warming, we love you man. But seriously, I very much love cold, there's just something about it that is so very much better than heat. Maybe it's all the fun I derive from being properly clad, or maybe it's that I don't get my eyes poked out by boobies wherever they turn. Yes, severe cold, that's just bad and unenjoyable, it usually also hurts.

There are some unique problems related to col, though, that are not apparent in warmness. There is for example the ever looming, low to the ground, winter sun ... that thing is just annoying with it's desire to kill people's eyes, why, why do you have to do it you silly thing! Another is the fact that my favourite tea procuring building is always full, especially when I want to go in for a cup. See, I love tea, and I do great work at tea shops, but it's difficult to do when there is nowhere to sit down and actually have that tea. Stupid too small place.

item.title: Takoj&Zdaj
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Vau (se vedno se pocutim neumno kadar ta medmet napisem v slovenscini), sploh si ne morete predstavljati kako cas bezi, ko skusas najti nacin, da spravis dovolj ur v dan in tako ustvaris moznost koncanja vseh potrebnih opravil do bozica. Hec je v tem, da sem se verjetno pogreznil pregloboko. Obstaja namrec dobro placan projekt, ki ga je treba koncati do bozica, potem pa je temu prilepljena se majhna tezava treh slik, ki sem se jih namernil ustvariti za praznicna darila.

Vse skupaj se menda zakljuci z dejstvom, da bo strip koncan in posodobljen pravocasno, v nekako treh dneh, in da bodo novice postale malce bolj raztrescene, anglezi bi rekli, da se bodo pojavljale now and anon.

Vecina ljudi tega idioma sicer ne pozna, vendar je po mojem okusu najboljsi v obstoju. Vzemimo ga torej popolnoma direktno in recimo, da now v slovenscini pomeni nekako zdaj ali celo zdajle, anon pa pomeni takoj ali zdajci. Ce jih povezemo dobimo nekaj, kar je na videz popoln oksimoron, vendar pa se izkaze, da pomeni obcasno in brez reda ... fantasticen jezik.

item.title: Now&Anon
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Wow, can you imagine how time flies when you're trying to figure out a way to shove enough hours into the day to be able to finish all of the tasks at hand by Christmas. The thing is that I've probably gotten myself in too deep, there is the very lovely paid website project that has to be done and the small manner of three paintings I decided to do as holiday presents.

All in all it really adds up to the fact that the comic will be updated on time, in three days or so, and taht the news postings will go back to happening now and anon instead of anything like a schedule.

Many people are unfamiliar with the idiom now and anon but it's really the best bloody idiom in the whole English language. Looking at it literally it seems more as an oxy moron where now means at this very point in time and anon means something along the lines of right away. Put them together and what do you get? You get a phrase that means seldom ... fantastic language.

item.title: Raziskava
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Javna zabava, kot naprimer nanizanke in filmi, ponavadi zelo razisce tematiko svojega dela, tako bi nekdo, ki dela film o raverjih, mocno raziskal rave in to kulturo, prav tako pa bi se v tematiko poglobili vsi igralci in pravzaprav vsi, ki imajo kaj moznosti spreminjati vsebino dogajanja. Ponavadi so raziskave dovolj obsezne, da so napake tezko opazne, ali pa jih sploh ni.

Potem pa imamo se dela, ki puscajo zevajoce luknje v karakterjih in splosnem dogajanju. Eden takih je The IT Crowd. Ne razumite narobe, nanizanka je odlicna in ena redkih, ki cloveka se lahko nasmeje tako kot Monty Python, vsaj vsakogar, ki je vsaj malo geeka.

V eni od epizod sta oba geeka prikazana pri ocitni uporabi Internet Explorer 6. Prav, veliko ljudi ga uporablja, ampak, da ga uporabljata dve osebi takega kova je pa nepredstavljivo. Ni kot, da so spregledali neko majhno podrobnost, in ni kot, da je bilo splosno poglabljanje slabo, saj imajo celo Leteco spagetarsko posast. Veliki problem tu je, da je Brskalniska vojna ze zelo star pojav, ki se je zacel ze v davnem 1995, kar je zacuda stareje od Googla. Lahko oprostimo dejstvo, da uporabljata windowse, ker pac delata za veliko podjetje v majhnem racunalniskem oddelku, ampak IE je pa preko vseh razumnih meja. Nekdo bi moral napisati jezno pismo ustvarjalcem te nanizanke.

item.title: Research
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Public entertainment like different sitcoms, films etc. usually do a lot of research on the theme their work revolves around. Thus somebody making a sitcom about ravers would do a lot of research about rave and its culture as would the actors and much anybody involved in the content. Most of the time the research does well and the mistakes are difficult to spot if not even unexistant.

But then there are shows that simply leave a gaping hole in their characters and everyting going on. Such a show is The IT Crowd. Don't get me wrong, it's an awesome show and one of the few that can actually make a viewer laugh as much as to Monty Python, at least anybody who's at least a bit into geekdom.

In one of the episodes the two geeks are clearly shown using Internet Explorer 6. Sure, many people use it, but that the characters of their nature used it is just beyond comprehension. It's not like they missed out on some little detail, and it's not like the overall research was bad, I mean, they even have the Flying Spaghetti Monster. The large issue here is that the Browser War has been going on since 1995 and that's quite a while ago, hell, that's older than Google. We can let go of the fact they're using windows because that's excusable when they're working for a large company in a lowly IT department, but IE is just beyond excusability. Somebody should write an angry letter to the creators of that show.

item.title: Nepomembnost
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
V preteklosti se je clovestvo pojmovalo za najpomembnejsi dejavnik v vesolju. Vse zvezde so krozile okoli zemlje in enako je veljalo za vsa nebesna telesa. Potem pa je na sceno stopil Nikolaj Kopernik, ki je zasnoval heliocentricni sistem in nenadoma nismo bili ravno najpomembnejsa stvar v vesolju, vsaj kar se tice gibanja planetov ne, bili pa smo kar pomembni v vseh drugih pogledih.

Trenutno je clovestvo v stanju, ko misli, da je najrazvitejsa oblika v zivljenju, kar pa se mi zdi preprosto smesno, ker ni osnovano na nicemer drugem kot necimrnosti in pojmovanju, da smo kralji nasega planeta, ceprav niti tega se nismo popolnoma raziskali.

Problem lezi v dejstvu, da se je v znanosti dolgo pojmovalo, da je Zemlja edini planet primeren za zivljenje in ko ji prislo do NLPjev in podobnega, se je vse potisnilo v pripovedke in znanstveno fantastiko. Prepican sem, da vecina takih pojavov niso vesoljci, ker ko pomislis, kaj kmalu ugotovis, da ce so bitja tako razvita, da nas sploh lahko dosezejo, zakaj bi nas pravzaprav hotela? Ljudje tudi ne delajo prijateljev iz mravelj.

Tezava je v tem, da tudi opremljeni s tem dejstvom, na drugih planetih se vedno iscemo samo znake nekega bakterijskega zivljenja ali celo samo fosilne ostanke le-tega, v upanju, da bomo s tem dokazali obstoj zivljenja na drugih planetih. Ampak ali ni to rahlo neumno? Iskati dokaz, da smo se vedno najbolj razvita rasa v vesolju, medtem ko ne moremo niti na drug planet, kaj sele osoncje.

Ta video, se mi zdi, kaze kako nepomembni pravzaprav smo.

item.title: Significance
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
In the past humanity has regarded itself as the single most significant thing in the universe. All stars circulated us and so did all other celestial bodies. Then came alone one Nicolaus Copernicus who defined the heliocentric system and suddenly we weren't quite the most important thing in the universe as far as planetary motion went, but we were still the most important in all other aspects.

Right now humanity seems to be at a stage where humans are the most developed life form in the whole known universe. To me this seems rather silly because it's based on absolutely nothing other than vanity and the feeling that we are the masters of our planet, even though we haven't explored even that fully.

The thing is in mainstream science it was for a long time believed that Earth is the only place suitable for life and when all the incidents with UFOs and such came out they were pushed into hearsay and science fiction. I'm almost certain most sightings aren't aliens because when you think about it, why would aliens want to explore and befriend us? There is no reason behind it as for them to even be able to get here they would have to be far more technologically advanced and I believe humans dont' try befriending ants.

Problem is that even with this idea in our heads we still only look for bacteria and even only fossil to prove there is perhaps, or once was, life outside our planet. Isn't that just a little bit pretentious? To basically be looking for proof that we're still the most significant force in the universe, yet we can't even get to another planet let alone solar system.

This video, for example, shows just how insignificant we actually are.

item.title: Inventar
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Vsem so vsec RPG igre v kakrsnikoli obliki in nacinu, vsem, ki kaj pomenijo vsaj. Sam sem jih preigral ze kar nekaj, od slabih do dobrih, vendar vecinoma dobre. Zabavne so, vendar se vsi strinjajo, da imajo nekaj hudih pomankljivosti, oz. dve, ki si jih delijo vse. Ena je neprestano tekanje naokoli brez kakrsnegakoli dogajanja, samo tekanje ... druga je uporaba inventarja in ta je se hujsa, ker je ponavadi krivec za tekanjem.

In kaj je pravzaprav ta tezava z inventarjem, bi se lahko vprasali. V resnici je samo ena, da ni nikoli narejen tako, da bi delal z igralcem ampak, da dela proti le-temu. Inventar obstaja zato, da je igra bolj realisticna mapk tudi bolj nezabavna ... realisticna? Zakaj bi potrebovali nekaj kar naredi imaginativno fantazijsko igro bolj realisticno, ce jo naredu tudi manj zanimivo?

Seveda, razlog lezi v tem, da je zaradi tega igra tezja in tako daljsa, hkrati pa igra s tem dobi neka osnovna pravila. Vendar stojim za dejstvom, da bi lahko bilo vse skupaj lazje.

Obstaja veliko razlicnih nacino, kako narediti, da inventar sovrazi uporabnika. Osnovni je nacin uporabljen v Diablo 1, kjer je inventar preprost pravokotnik narejen iz kvadratkov, kamor potem dajemo predmete in ko njihova velikost zapolni vse skupaj je inventar poln; v Diablo 2 je stvar malo izblojsana z uporabo skrinje, ki jo puscamo doma. Potem v igrah baziranih na DnD imamo kombinacijo kvadratkov s tezo in tu je treba paziti tako na velikost predmetov kot na njihovo tezo, veliko bolje, a se vedno zelo omejeno. Vse skupaj se v vecini izboljsa z uporabo vec igralcev, ki si lahko razdelijo breme ali inventarjem z vec stranmi, kar da vec prostora. Podobno je z vrecami, ki mocno povecajo prostornino inventarja, vendar ne pomagajo veliko pri tezi.

Najboljsi inventar, kar sem jih kdaj videl, pa je v igri UltimaOnline. Sestavljen je bil iz preprostega nahrbtnika v katerega si potem metal predmete brez vsake urejenosti in brige na to kam so se postavili, vazna je bila edino teza. Vanj si lahko zmetal kolikor si hotel vrec in celo nahrbtnikov ter tako pridobil vsaj nekaj organizacije in pregleda nad vsem skupaj. Problem je bil edino, da so se predmeti lahko prekrivali in ce nisi bil pozoren, si se kmalu znasel pred velikim kupom neurejenosti, ampak to je v redu, je preprosto in ne zivcira vec kot dovolis.

Tako da, resno, zakaj nima vec odlicnih iger dobrih inventarjev, ki te ne silijo v tekanje naokoli za vsakim izpraznjenim prostorom.

item.title: Inventory
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Most everybody likes RolePlayingGames in any sort or form, everyone that matters anyway. Surely enough, I've played many of them in my life, ranging from good to bad, but most were mainly good. They are fun, but everyone agrees that RPGs have some very bad things in common, one is the constant running around without anything much going on, just the running ... the other is inventory managment, and this is probably even worse as it is usually the culprit behind the running.

So what is the problem with inventory managment one might ask? There is only one really, it is never made so it would work with the player but rather so it works against them. It is a thing that is there to make the game more boring, yet more realistic. So ... a device that makes a fantasy imaginative game more realistic and unfun ... why exactly do we need this aspect of realism?

Sure, so it makes the whole process a bit harder and the game last longer and it is kind of important in giving the game some basic rules, but I stand by the fact that it could be made easier and better.

There are many different ways in making the inventory hate the user. The basic is how Diablo 1 does it, where the inventory is a small area of a few blocks and you can only fit so much in them, Diablo 2 improves this a bit with a chest you can leave at home. Then in DnD based games we have the blocks method combined with weight and here you have to be careful of both size of objects and their weight, a much better method, but still very limited. The way this is improved is that you have a party to which you can distribute your load, or the inventory has several pages so you can fit more in. The best are bags, they enlargen your inventory even though they only sometimes help with the weight.

Now, the best inventory I've ever seen was in UltimaOnline. It was a simple backpack that didn't care about placement, size or even orderliness, it only cared about weight. You could stash as many bags or even backpacks into it and thus have some basic organisation and overview. The problem here is only that objects can hide underneath eachother and if you're not careful you soon end up with a big incoherent mess, but that's ok, that's easy and it's simple and it doesn't annoy more than you let it.

So really, why dont' more great games also have good inventories that are simple to use and don't make you run around after every level you clean ...

item.title: The Loremo
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: A lot of people are saying that this is a silly car, that it's too small, too unpretty, looks cheap and what have you. But I find the Loremo to be a rather interesting little car. Of course it's not what you normally see on the road and it's far from being aesthetically pleasing to those who only like the sporty look, but that's alright, it wasn't meant to be that, it's meant to be an efficient little futuristic vehicle.

item.title: Kissybook
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The Kissybook is a colaborative art project that seems like a really cool idea, which is why I drew this cute little bunny in hopes of being included in the book. We'll see how it goes, I'll be sure to buy a copy, or a few, if I get in.

item.title: Zakon umetnost
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Danes sem bil z lepim PM-jem obvescen (ne bom rekel, da me je metron), da ima Marc Tauss a.k.a metron novo spletno stran s svojimi, ce lahko sam presodim, precudovitimi slikami. Vmes so njegove foto ilustracije, stil, ki ga ze od nekdaj obcudujem, in, kot kaze, se nekaj drugih stvari. Stvar si definitivno morate ogledati.

item.title: Art of cool
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Someone (I won't say it was metron) notified me today via a lovely PM that Marc Tauss a.k.a metron has a new website with his, if I can be the judge, amazingly awesome art. It features his photo illustrations, a style I've always adored, and apparently some other stuff. You should check it out.

item.title: Pica je grozna
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: In takole te lahko pica pusti zaznamovanega in prestrasenega za celo zivljenje.
